description.hltext_display: Tulsa homeless shelter hosts vigil to remember 47 people who died this year
description.author: MICHAEL OVERALL
description.content: The Day Center for the Homeless had 46 candles sitting out Tuesday night, one for each homeless person who died this year in Tulsa. Minutes before the memorial service began, officials heard about one more, and somebody went looking for an extra candle. The person apparently died months ago, but with no way to track people after they leave the Day Center, officials rely mostly on word of mouth to know somebody's fate. "We try not to overlook anyone," said Sandra Lewis, the Day Center's executive director. "But I'm afraid that we do." Every December on the winter solstice - the longest night of the year - homeless shelters nationwide hold memorial services for those who have died the previous year. The whole point, Lewis said, is to remember people who too often go forgotten, even by their own families. "For a lot of them, this is the only memorial service they will have," she said. "We became their family." Lighting the candles one-by-one, officials read all 47 names, but they wouldn't say which person had been added to the list at the last minute. "Each and every one of them was special and unique," Lewis said. "I don't want any of them to be forgotten." Last year's memorial service needed 52 candles, the most in memory. This year's number came a close second. "It is a shocking number," Lewis said. "And it's a sad number." All of them had been homeless at some point in the last year and had made use of the Day Center, she said. But not all of them died homeless. "My greatest comfortis knowing that many ofthem were able to get back into homes," often with the Day Center's help, Lewis said. "At least they didn't die alone on the streets." Original Print Headline: A light in the darkness Michael Overall 581-8383 michael.overall@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: صفير استقبل الصايغ وتلقى رسالة من الحريري عن أجواء المرحلة واتصالاته
AMResorts seeks 'vibrant' vibe with Now brand
description.content:
In a year that saw some hotel companies keep the brakes on development in Mexico, Philadelphia-based AMResorts opened two hotels on the Riviera Maya and started construction on a third in Puerto Vallarta, all part of its new Now Resorts & Spas brand.
"It's been a very busy year for us," said Matthew Mullen, AMResorts' senior director of sales.
The Now Jade Riviera Cancun made its debut early this year, a reflagging of a former NH hotel. And the Now Sapphire Riviera Cancun, the former Paradisus, was rebranded a Now in May.
The concept behind Now is "quite similar" to AMResorts' Dreams brand, Mullen said, except Now's focus is "on more vibrant, colorful entertainment and activities."
Compared with Dreams, Now properties have more live music, dance lessons and Spanish lessons as well as more of a focus on the Core Zone teen clubs. The all-inclusive resorts have 24-hour room and concierge services, spas and fitness centers and live entertainment.
For the next six months or so, prices at Now properties will be "a bit less" than at Dreams because AMResorts is fulfilling contracts made with previous management companies. However, by mid-2011, the pricing will be "about the same" as Dreams, according to Mullen.
Four additional Now resorts are planned: three in the Dominican Republic and one in Mexico. The 350-room Now Amber Puerto Vallarta, under construction and scheduled for a mid-2012 opening, will be the first Now built from the ground up.
However, Mullen said other properties could join the brand before then, through the rebranding of existing hotels. AMResorts operates two other brands besides Now and Dreams: Secrets and Zoetry.
"In the next 12 to 18 months, we will see some hotels wanting to reflag and bring in a new management company because they haven't done well under their current management," Mullen said.
AMResorts' next Mexico property, set to open in June, is a 500-room Secrets being built in the Pacific coast resort area of Huatulco, near a Dreams that opened there about 18 months ago.
All of the AMResorts brands have a "hotel-within-the resort" called the "Preferred Club," typically between 100 and 120 rooms that offer more luxurious amenities and services. Rates are generally about "30% to 40%" higher for those rooms, Mullen said.

description.hltext_display: Spoedrepa-ratie op A27
description.content: Breda - Weggebruikers op de A27 krijgen woensdagochtend te maken met een stremming ter hoogte van Breda. In de richting van Gorinchem is een rijbaan afgesloten vanwege een spoedreparatie aan het wegdek. Door de vorst is er een gat in het wegdek ontstaan. Ook is het wegdek gescheurd. Dat liet Rijkswaterstaat woensdag weten. Rijkswaterstaat adviseert weggebruikers om te rijden via de A16 en A59. Het is nog niet bekend hoelang de werkzaamheden gaan duren.

description.hltext_display: Soutenons les énergies renouvelables
description.author: LeMonde.fr
description.content:
C'est sur fond de vives inquiétudes pour le développement futur en France d'une alternative énergétique crédible que la région accueille cette semaine le colloque national de France Energie Eolienne, branche éolienne du syndicat des énergies renouvelables. Lire la suite l'article
En quelques mois à peine, plusieurs décisions préoccupantes ont en effet été prises. En juin dernier, la majorité s'en est pris à la filière éolienne en imposant, lors du vote de la loi Grenelle II, des restrictions de nature à décourager l'implantation de nouveaux mâts sur le territoire. C'est maintenant l'énergie solaire qui est dans le collimateur, puisque le gouvernement a décrété un moratoire de trois mois suspendant l'obligation faite à EDF de racheter l'électricité produite par les grandes installations photovoltaïques.
Cette décision, qui intervient après deux baisses en moins d'un an du tarif de rachat imposé à EDF, met en péril l'éclosion de la filière solaire en France. Si l'on veut en encourager l'essor, il est indispensable de garantir aux industriels et aux particuliers un minimum de visibilité et de sécurité sans lesquelles il devient beaucoup trop aléatoire d'investir dans les technologies photovoltaïques, sans doute prometteuses mais encore balbutiantes. Les hésitations gouvernementales, qui se traduisent par d'incessants changements du cadre réglementaire, ne peuvent au contraire que décourager les initiatives.
Ces mauvais tours joués à l'éolien et au photovoltaïque remettent en cause notre capacité à respecter notre engagement européen, également inscrit dans la loi Grenelle I, de porter à 23% la part des énergies renouvelables dans notre consommation énergétique finale en 2020 elles n'en représentent aujourd'hui que 10 %.
Mais ils sont également lourds de conséquences économiques. Dans une France en crise, confrontée à un chômage structurel et à la lente décomposition de son tissu industriel, la structuration d'une véritable filière française des énergies renouvelables représente en effet un inestimable potentiel d'emplois. C'est pourquoi de nombreuses collectivités, à la recherche d'un nouveau modèle économique, plus durable, ont joué le jeu du Grenelle et ont décidé de bâtir sur les énergies renouvelables des stratégies de reconversion et de diversification de leurs activités.... lire la suite de l'article sur Le Monde.fr

description.hltext_display: DGAP-News: Willkie Farr&Gallagher LLP advises e.n.o. energy again on the sale of wind farms in Germany and for the first time in France
description.content: DGAP-News: Willkie Farr & Gallagher LLP / Key word(s): Disposal/Disposal Willkie Farr & Gallagher LLP advises e.n.o. energy again on the sale of wind farms in Germany and for the first time in France 22.12.2010 / 09:24 --------------------------------------------------------------------- e.n.o. energy has sold an onshore wind farm comprising of 7 Vestas turbines with a total of 14 megawatt in Rhineland-Palatinate to the Dutch private equity fund DIF Renewable Energy. Furthermore, e.n.o. energy has sold an onshore wind farm nearby Le Havre, France, comprising of 5 Enercon turbines with a total of 10 megawatt to DIF Renewable Energy, which will start operation in June 2011. e.n.o. energy has established itself on the European market in the development, construction, financing and management of wind turbines over the course of the last ten years. DIF Renewable Energy is a private equity fond specialized in the wind and solar energy sector, as well as in other renewable energies, which focuses on the European, as well as on the North American markets. Adviser e.n.o. energy: Willkie Farr & Gallagher LLP (M&A/Corporate): Partners Dr. Andreas Hautkappe (lead Frankfurt), Ed Fernandez (Paris); Associates Ingo Bednarz (Frankfurt), Nicolas Tollet (Paris) Willkie Farr & Gallagher LLP is an international law firm with more than 600 attorneys and offices in New York, Washington, London, Milan, Rome, Frankfurt am Main and Brussels. The firm is headquartered in New York, NY, 787 Seventh Avenue, tel.: 001 212 728 8000. End of financial news 22.12.2010 Dissemination of a Corporate News, transmitted by DGAP - a company of EquityStory AG. The issuer is solely responsible for the content of this announcement. description.hltext_display: MALDEN: State OK’s national education standards
description.content: The state Board of Education unanimously signed off yesterday on efforts to incorporate national Common Core standards into the state’s public education curriculums, with plans to fully implement the standards into testing by 2013. “My sense of talking to folks around the state . . . is, overall, a lot of excitement, a lot of energy around the step forward these new standards represent,’’ Education Commissioner Mitchell Chester said at a board meeting in Malden. Several board members described the vote as momentous and historic.

event_or_fact.property: at a board meeting in Malden

description.hltext_display: 上海家化改制启航 国资改革趟入深水区
Jobportal til Europa-venlige unge
description.content:
På Graduateland.com bliver både job, praktikpladser og uddannelsesmuligheder i Europa samlet under et.
Det skriver Berlingske Business.
"Hvis du vil til udlandet, og det måske ikke engang er afgørende for dig, om du skal til Barcelona eller Berlin, og gerne vil have et overblik over hele Europa, får du det samlede udbud på vores hjemmeside," siger Patrick Lund, stifter af hjemmesiden, til Berlingske Business.
På Graduateland.com kan brugerne oprette en profil, hvor de præsenterer sig selv. Samtidig kan man søge job i bestemte lande og byer og inden for bestemte brancher.
Jobudbuddet er dog indtil videre for feinschmeckere. De 400 virksomheder, der opdaterer stillingsopslag på hjemmesiden er først og fremmest de virksomheder, der vurderes som de mest attraktive arbejdspladser i verden - f.eks. Microsoft, Porsche og Nokia.

description.hltext_display: CIA forms WikiLeaks Task Force to gauge leaks impact
description.content:
US intelligence agency scarcely mentioned in cables, but wishes to check if ability to recruit informants hurt by whistleblower.
The CIA has decided to launch a panel, entitled the WikiLeaks Task Force, in order to gauge the effect of the leaking of thousands of US diplomatic cables by the whistleblower website, the Washington Post reported on Wednesday.
The US intelligence agency is launching the task force despite the fact that the CIA has been relatively untouched by the leaks.
RELATED:
A major issue the panel plans to address is whether the CIA's ability to recruit informants was damaged by the belief that the US government is unable to guard its secrets.
"The director asked the task force to examine whether the latest release of WikiLeaks documents might affect the agency's foreign relationships or operations," the paper quoted CIA spokesman George Little as saying.
The release of the US diplomatic cables has caused Washington and several of its allies embarrassment.
Shortly after the initial release of the cables last month, US Secretary of State Hilary Clinton said the US is taking "aggressive steps" to find those responsible for the release of documents by WikiLeaks.
She explained that every country must be able to hold private conversations on concerning issues. She added that confidential communication is fundamental in the ability to serve public interest.
Clinton expressed confidence that the partnerships and relationships built by the Obama administration will withstand the challenge posed by the WikiLeaks exposure.
More about:
Hillary Rodham Clinton, The Washington Post, Director of National Intelligence, Central Intelligence Agency
Subscribe to our Newsletter to receive news updates directly to your email

description.hltext_display: Afghan official blasts NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
Militant groups (37)
War casualties (70)
War and unrest (405)
Government and politics (5232)
General news (8339)
Places:
Pakistan (70)
South Asia (140)
Central Asia (182)
Afghanistan (182)
Asia (765)
KABUL, Afghanistan — A provincial governor in Afghanistan said Wednesday that a battle between NATO and the Taliban the previous day had killed three women and two children, and called on the coalition to "pay attention" to civilian casualties.
Afghan officials have often spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.
Also Wednesday, NATO said that a leader of the Haqqani network — militants who operate out of western Pakistan and eastern Afghanistan — was killed in a Dec. 18 operation grouping international forces and their Afghan counterparts in the eastern Khost province.
In Helmand, a Taliban stronghold and scene of some of the heaviest fighting in the nearly ten-year-old war, the provincial governor's office said that the five civilians died Tuesday as militants attacked coalition forces in the Sangin district. Seven insurgents were killed in the battle, according to the statement from the governor's office.
NATO has said it was investigating the civilian fatalities and that it exercises the utmost caution during operations to minimize such occurrences. The coalition said Tuesday that insurgents were using a civilian home to attack its forces and that the insurgents launched their attack with assault rifles and a machine gun. NATO troops returned fire and used mortars.
A U.N. report this month said that Afghan civilian casualties increased by 20 percent in the first 10 months of 2010, compared with the same period a year earlier. It said there were at least 6,215 conflict-related civilian casualties — 2,412 deaths and 3,803 injuries.
But the U.N. report also found that civilian casualties attributed to NATO and pro-government forces dropped by 18 percent compared to the first 10 months of 2009.
The governor's office said it wants NATO "to pay attention to civilian causalities during operations and prevent civilian causalities."
In the operation in Khost province, NATO said intelligence reports led international and Afghan troops to a compound in the Terezai district where an ensuing gun battle killed the Haqqani network leader, identified as Usman, along with an unspecified number of insurgents. NATO said Usman had coordinated and conducted attacks on its forces in Khost.
The Haqqani network is among militant groups that have hideouts in neighboring Pakistan from where they attack targets inside Afghanistan. U.S. officials have urged Pakistan to launch an offensive on the North Waziristan area where these groups are based, but Islamabad has rebuffed such requests, saying its forces are stretched too thin for such an operation without drawing down troops facing its archrival, India.

description.hltext_display: River flows better, as is fishing; water clarity improved
description.content:
The river action is picking up now that flows are closer to normal and the clarity has improved.
Among the hot steelhead spots are the Bogachiel on the Olympic Coast and the upper Columbia around Brewster.
RIVERS
Columbia: Fishing on the upper river for steelhead with a jig and bobber has been very good. Anglers are using jigs under slip bobbers baited with pink shrimp, in water 3-28 feet deep. Fishing in the lower river has been poor.
Cowlitz: The fishing has slowed a bit in the last week as the water got a little cloudy, but the level has been holding steady at around 9,880 cfs for a couple days now and that should help the bite, said Marshall Borsom at Fish Country. Steelhead are being caught from Blue Creek all the way up to Barrier Dam. Many anglers are using corkies and yarn, jig and bobber or a glow bead and sand shrimp. Boaters also are using divers with coon striped shrimp, plugs and eggs. Borsom said a few bright late B run coho are being caught too.
Kalama: There was no catch observed by state employees on Sunday. River conditions were less than optimal.
Lewis: Anglers are catching some steelhead on the mainstem and the North Fork. Flows below Merwin Dam have returned to near normal levels for this time of year.
Nisqually: Anglers are catching an occasional chum, but that seems to be the exception. Reports from anglers on Gamefishin.com show people are hooking maybe one or two fish an outing.
Olympic Coast: The steelhead action, mostly hatchery fish, has been good the past few days, said Bob Gooding at Olympic Sporting Goods. The rivers are in pretty good shape. The Bogachiel is the place to be, Gooding said.
Puyallup: Although river conditions are good, the fishing has been on the slow side. A few chum are being caught, but they seem to be the exception more than the rule.
Tilton: Last week, Tacoma Power employees put 150 coho adults, nine jacks, four winter-run steelhead and two cutthroat trout into the river at Gust Backstrom Park in Morton.
Yakima: Fishing fair to good. Fly anglers are having the most luck with stonefly nymphs, like a size 8 or 10 Pats orange stonefly, said a report from Reds Fly Shop. River flows continue to slowly fall.
LAKES
Chelan: Trolling for lake trout at the Yacht Club has also been lights out, said Anton Jones of Darrell and Dads Family Guide Service. The lake has entered its big fish time of the year. The key to is managing your line to prevent slack, and to allow solid hook sets.
Mayfield: The lake is producing some good catches of trout for bank anglers near the Hatchery. Orange or red Power Eggs, or worms, fished off the bottom are productive.
Rufus Woods: Action for triploid rainbow trout has been very good to excellent. Jones recommends trolling flies, with an action disk in front of something with marabou in the tail. If that doesnt work, go to the pens and fish some Pautzkes Fire Bait in rainbow either off the bottom with a slip sinker rig or from the top with a jig and bobber.
SALTWATER
Fly fishing: The Tacoma Narrows remains the best location, with anglers having a decent chance of catching a resident coho. Try a Clouser minnow or switch to smaller krill patterns, said a staffer at Gig Harbor Fly Shop.
Tacoma: The fishing remains very slow. Last week, 27 anglers were checked at local boat ramps by the state, and they brought in just one coho. Art Tachell at Point Defiance Boathouse Marina said coho are being caught off Point Fosdick. The squid action remains fairly good as well. Crabbing in the South Sound has been good on the Nisqually Flats.
Jeffrey P. Mayor: 253-5970-8640 jeff.mayor@thenewstribune.com blog.thenewstribune.com/adventure

description.hltext_display: India's most downloaded celebs
description.content:
B-Town's 'bad boy' is the most downloaded celebrity across the country
Lady Gaga and Justin Bieber might be among Google's most searched persons in the world in 2010. But Indians just can't get enough of Salman, Katrina and cricket.
This is what a recent mobile survey conducted by a service provider across the nation revealed. Smses from all over the nation poured in which were then calculated to reveal the latest trends.
Atul Bindal, president of the company that conducted the survey, said, "Today, people across India are increasingly relying on the mobile platform as a source of entertainment and information, including songs, videos, wallpapers and applications. The findings are a true manifestation of what appeals to the Indian masses."
The survey has six categories, and showcases the most popular songs, wallpapers, photos and festivals in the year 2010. It reflects the country's wild passion for cricket, music and Bollywood.

description.hltext_display: Ölpest im Golf von Mexiko: Chronik einer Katastrophe
description.content: Keine andere Umwelkatastrophe hat die Schlagzeilen in diesem Jahr derart beherrscht wie die Ölpest im Golf von Mexiko. Nach dem Untergang der Ölplattform "Deepwater Horizon" strömten mehr als 700 Millionen Liter Öl ins Meer - die braune Brühe bescherte den USA die schlimmste Umweltkatastrophe ihrer Geschichte. Ein Rückblick.

description.hltext_display: Live Christmas trees still available
description.content:
Kristina and Markus Werner are helped by Jerry Garcia as they pick out a Christmas tree at Sunland Park and Mesa.
Live Christmas trees still are available at several locations on the West Side, including:
Joy Christmas Tree: Lowe's Big 8 parking lot at Mesa and Doniphan; and Coronado Shopping Center at Mesa and Sunland Park. Information: 474-5009
Walmart Supercenter: 7555 N. Mesa. Information: 833-1335.
Home Depot: 7545 N. Mesa. Information: 585-2319.
Lowe's Home Improvement: 430 E. Redd. Information: 581-4401.

description.hltext_display: Wirtschaft leidet unter Winter
description.content: Berlin – Das strenge Winterwetter könnte das Wirtschaftswachstum erheblich bremsen: Eine lange und schneereiche Frostperiode könne drei Milliarden Euro Wertschöpfung kosten - was eine Verlangsamung des Wirtschaftswachstums um einem halben Prozentpunkt im Quartal bedeute, sagte der Chefvolkswirt des Deutschen Industrie- und Handelskammertages (DIHK), Volker Treier, der „Berliner Zeitung”. Er verwies auf die Erfahrungen zu Beginn dieses Jahres, als ähnliche Wetterbedingungen herrschten. Deutschlands Wirtschaft war in den ersten Monaten nur um 0,6 Prozent im Vergleich zum Vorquartal gewachsen. Unter Frost und Schnee hat besonders die Bauwirtschaft zu leiden. Schon von Januar bis März hätten die Beschäftigten auf dem Bau nicht richtig arbeiten können, sagte eine Sprecherin des Zentralverbands des Baugewerbes der Zeitung.

description.hltext_display: Ungersk mediekontroll fördöms
description.content: Sedan det ungerska parlamentet natten till tisdagen ändrade författningen och införde en lag om statlig kontroll av press, radio, tv och internet möter den ungerska regeringen, som nästa vecka övertar EU-ordförandeskapet, mycket hård kritik från utlandet. Luxemburgs utrikesminister kräver att EU-kommissionen omedelbart agerar mot planerna och han ifrågasätter om Ungern är värdigt att leda EU.

description.hltext_display: Nace en Cantabria un cluster de empresas dedicado al automóvil de competición
description.content: La sede de la empresa pública SODERCAN ha acogido hoy la presentación de un cluster compuesto por cinco empresas de Cantabria especializadas en asesorar, diseñar, desarrollar y fabricar sistemas hidrá...

description.hltext_display: [장외주식]`IPO주` 티에스이, 최고 상승률
description.content: 22일 종합주가지수(2038.11pt)가 외국인과 개인의 매수로 강보합을 보인 가운데, 장외시장은 종목별 혼조세로 마감됐다. 장내 현대미포조� (010620)이 52주 � � 가를 경� 하면서, 동사의 최대주주인 현대삼호중공업(7만6500원,+4.79%)도 7만원 중반 진입에 성공했다.현대엔지니어링(35만2500원,+2.17%)도 2일 연속 상승하며 하락추세가 어느� �도 진� �된 모습이며, 현대아산(1만1750원,+2.17%)은 7거래일만에 반등에 성공했다.삼성광주� �자(2만1650원,+0.70%)나 소폭 상승했으나, 대부분의 삼성계열주들은 약세를 보였다.삼성SDS(16만4250원,-0.15%)가 장후반 소폭 하락했� , 서울통� 기� (8만1500원,-1.21%), 시큐아이닷컴(8900원,-0.56%)역시 하락 마감했다.현대로지� (8950원,-1.10%)은 삼성SDS의 물류업진출 소식에 약세가 이어졌� , 4만원까지 급등했던 엘지씨엔에스(3만9850원,-1.60%)도 하루만에 3만원대 후반으로 밀� �났다.SK건설(4만4500원,+3.49%)이 상승에 성공했지만, 포스코건설(8만2750원,-0.30%), 롯데건설(6만3000원),LIG건설(8150원)은 상승에 실패했다.금융주에서는 삼성자산운용(3만5000원,+1.45%)이 52주 최� 가를 다시 기록하며 가장 돋보였� , 한국증권금융(1만5150원,+1.68%)도 2일 연속 상승에 성공했다.반면, 미래에셋생명(1만1000원,-0.90%), kdb생명(5100원), IBK투자증권(6850원), 하이투자증권(1725원)등 보험,증권주는 별다른 변동이 없었다.KT파워텔(9550원,-2.05%) 장내 KT계열 종목의 � � �에도 불구하� , 좀처럼 상승의 모습을 보이지 못하� 있다.IPO(기업공개)관� � 종목들은 관망세가 우세한 가운데, 공모예� � 종목인 티에스이(4만9000원,+6.52%)의 상승� 이 가장 높았다. 티에스이의 공모는 12.23~24일 실시되며 공모가격은 주당 4만5000원이다.상장심사 승인 종목인 나노� 소재(1만9150원,+0.79%), 심사청구 종목인 현대위아(9만4900원,+2.04%)가 상승 마감했으며, 오늘 공모를 완료하는 두산엔진(1만9600원,-2.00%), 인텍플러스(7250원,-3.33%)는 각각 하락세를 보였다.두산엔진과 인텍플러의 상장예� �일은 각각 내년 1월4일과 1월5일이다[피스탁� �공 ]� �작권자 ⓒ `돈이 보이는 리얼타임 뉴스` 머니투데이

description.hltext_display: 恒指冲高回落涨51点 收复23000点
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
和讯股票消息 受内地股市疲软影响,恒指冲高回落,最终收复23000点。截至收盘,恒指报收23045.19点,上涨51.33点,涨幅为0.22%。国企指数报收12611.30点,上涨3.87点,涨幅为0.03%;红筹指数报收4176.26点,上涨22.13点,涨幅为0.53%。大市全天趁机高541.99亿港元,创8月30日以来近4个月新低。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 三甲金融港股研究员刘晓杰认为,恒指上行至空方较优派货区间23200点位下沿亦受到压制,多空于23000―23200点位区间展开第一轮较量,短阶段稳定震荡格局明显。当前投资者可采取的策略仍为:维持前期二成的试探仓位,同时对于以恒指为标志的港市,不必于23000上方急于追涨,因受23200空方主力较优派货区间下方横档位克制,恒指短阶承压,稳定震荡格局仍将维系,可适时于22680―22880点位区间续入一成仓位布局,保持总持仓三成仓位,同时对于前期已布局三成仓位之投资者,可维持仓位,并密切关注后市恒指形态演绎。
富泰证券认为,欧、美股市续升,利多恒指22日表现,但内地同业拆借利率持续上升,预示市场银根趋紧的势头不变,令A股早盘再度受压,加上港股临近圣诞假期,预计恒指短期于成交清淡之际,将维持22,800-23,300点间上落走势。
据报道,韩国军方近日计划举行两场大规模射击演习,一场是从12月22日开始在韩国东部海岸举行的海军射击演习;另一场是从12月23日开始,在韩朝边境举行的陆、空实弹射击训练。英国媒体形容,此次演习投入的兵力为和平时期以来“最大规模”。市场担忧这次军演很可能激怒朝鲜。朝鲜半岛的紧张局势本来已经开始缓解,因据闻朝鲜同意国际原子能总署的人员进入该国检查核设施。
【独家稿件声明】凡注明 “和讯”来源之作品（文字、图片、图表）， 未经和讯网授权，任何媒体和个人不得全部或者部分转载。如需转载，请与 010-85650688联系；经许可后转载务必请注明出处，并添加源链接，违者本网将依法追究责任。

description.hltext_display: Neighborhoods in Logan, Nibley, Hyrum deal with flooding
description.content:
Standing water along Golf Course Road in Logan on Tuesday. (Jennifer Meyers/Herald Journal) By John Funk The Herald Journal | 0 comments
High precipitation and melting snow have been raising water tables throughout Cache County, local officials say, causing groundwater to seep into foundations and accumulate in the basements of some residents.
"There's been a lot of rain and a whole lot of snow," said Logan's waste water division manager Mike Roundy, explaining that neighborhoods in southwestern Logan have been hit particularly hard. "They're kind of in the bottom of the bowl, so all the water runs down there. ... It got into some people's basements and they're pumping it out."
Among those affected is homeowner Cindy Smith, who lives in the Logan's Meadowbrook subdivision. She said she was awakened by the sound of running water in the early hours of Monday morning.
"When we found it, it was about 2:30 in the morning, and it was about an inch and a half," she said. "We started wet-vaccing out as much as we could ... and as fast as we took it out, it just kept coming back in. So we just had to wait until the rainwater stopped."
She added that there was significant damage, none of which is covered under her homeowner's insurance.
"All of the carpet and padding, there was no way we were going to save it," she said. "It's going to be a lot of work."
Mike Jones, vice president of operations for ARS Flood and Fire Cleanup, said that the lack of coverage under homeowner's insurance is a common problem for victims of flooding.
"Basically, you have to have flood insurance," he said. "And most homeowners in the valley don't have flood insurance. It's hard, because we're so close to Christmas. People weren't expecting to have this happen."
Jones said his company has received more than 100 calls from flooded homeowners over the past few days.
"This is one of the biggest I've seen in the past five years," he said, adding that rising groundwater problems are unusual for this time of year. "What we just saw is more typical of March or April."
Nibley City Manager Larry Anhder said the effects of rising water tables can be unpredictable.
"It's very random," he said. "One neighbor can have a problem, and another neighbor in a similar situation doesn't have a problem."
Anhder further explained that it's not entirely accurate to describe problems caused by rising water tables as "flooding," as they don't involve water running across the ground. He acknowledged, however, that the distinction is likely useless to residents with water in their basements.
Nibley resident Malia Roundy summed up her predicament succinctly: "We are wet."
Roundy, who has lived in her current home for four years, said her home has never flooded before. She expressed concern, however, for some of her neighbors, whose damage may have been more extensive than her own.
"We're going to be fine, because we have a semi-finished basement," she said. "We just had to pull up the carpet and the padding. It didn't effect our sheetrock and didn't touch our baseboards at all."
She added that the process has been far from painless, however.
"It's not very convenient to haul your stuff out of the basement," she said. "We're fortunate enough to have a garage. I feel bad for people who don't have a place to move their stuff to."
---
E-mail:
More about Flooding

ARTICLE: Cache Valley rivers maintain safe levels

description.hltext_display: Mexico Condo Investment; New Spanish Chamber of Commerce Office
description.content:
Spanish investors have brought a significant amount of the heavy international investment which has been drawn into Playa del Carmen. This fact has recently been acknowledged with the opening of a regional office for the Spanish Chamber of Commerce.
Among the large amount of international investment which has been drawn into in the past decade, a significant portion has come from Spanish developers. This large presence has recently been acknowledged and consolidated with the opening of a regional office for the Spanish Chamber of Commerce (CEC) in Quintana Roo, the Mexican state which includes Playa del Carmen, Cancun and Tulum.
During the first week of December 2010, at a meeting which included the state Secretary for Economic Development and Economic and Commercial Counselor of the Embassy of Spain, Francisco Javier Garzón well as employers and government officials gathered in the Hotel Azul Fives, which is currently one of the forefront options in in the area, and has been developed by a Spanish investment group.
The president of the new office stressed that the CEC in Quintana Roo would aim to strengthen the promotion of new investments, promote further trade relations with the Mexican Caribbean and promote cultural activities between both countries.
In that regard, he underlined the important work that the Ministry of Industry, Tourism and Commerce of Spain as well as various business organizations in Mexico have been carrying out through many projects to benefit the nearly 500 members that make up the Spanish Chamber of Commerce, with headquarters in Mexico City. The CEC has more than 100 years in Mexico, and have worked significantly to build closer economic and cultural ties to benefit the economies of both countries.
Spanish investment in Mexico, according to official data, exceeds 30 billion dollars with more than 2000 companies in various sectors. According to the Bank of Mexico, Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) from Spain grew by an average of 59 percent in the last decade and Mexico remains one of the main destinations of Spain's productive investment.
This is significant for the industry as a whole, but especially for the area around Playa del Carmen, which is home to more than half of the 120 hotels, or over 45,000 rooms, brought into existence by Spanish investors; in Playa del Carmen the real estate industry is very closely tied to the hotel and tourism industry, both gaining many benefits for buyers, and also in many cases offering condominium sales within the same resort developments, as is the case of the condo-resort The Fives, where the meeting took place.
Counting all industries, Quintana Roo receives the third highest amount of investment from Spain, only after the two states which Mexico City and its suburbs dominate.
TOPMexicoRealEstate.com; Mexico's Leading Network of Specialists for Finding and Purchasing Mexican Properties Safely

description.hltext_display: 山西转型“长跑”有望获突� �
Ищут виноватого в страшном ДТП в Сибири
description.content:
Теги: Авто, ДТП, Красноярск, Регионы, ЧП
Главное следственное управление ГУВД Красноярского края возбудило уголовное дело по факту крупной аварии в Красноярском крае, где в результате столкновения автобуса с грузовиком погибли восемь человек, сообщил в среду представитель ГУВД края Владимир Юрченко. МЧС Тувы ранее сообщило о девяти погибших. В ГУВД края и краевом МЧС эту информацию опровергли и подтвердили, что число погибших по-прежнему восемь человек. По предварительным данным результате аварии травмы получили 7 человек, сейчас их число выросло до девяти, все они госпитализированы.
«Дело возбуждено по статье 264 УК РФ (нарушение правил дорожного движения и эксплуатации транспортных средств). Расследованием занимаются сотрудники главного следственного управления при ГУВД края. Сейчас уточняются полные данные погибших. Виновнику аварии грозит лишение свободы на срок до семи лет», – сказал Юрченко.
Как сообщила РИА Новости представитель пресс-службы правительства Тувы Долаана Салчак, все находившиеся в автобусе люди, кроме одного, являются жителями Тувы. Всего в автобусе было 16 человек.
Напомним, что вчера вечером в Красноярской области, на 567-м километре автодороги Кемерово-Красноярск возле населенного пункта Большая Косуль Боготольского района автобус КИА «Грандберд» выполнял коммерческий рейс из Кызыла в Новосибирск. В салоне находились 13 пассажиров и три водителя. По невыясненным пока причинам водитель потерял управление, его развернуло, в результате чего произошло столкновение с грузовым автомобилем СКАНИЯ, принадлежащий ООО «Томское пиво». В результате столкновения 8 человек погибли. Об этом сообщает ИТАР-ТАСС со ссылкой на пресс-службу Ространснадзора. По предварительным данным, причиной трагедии стало лопнувшее колесо, сообщает ИА REGNUM.
Для родственников погибших и пострадавших в этом дорожно-транспортном происшествии в Красноярском крае открыта «горячая линия», сообщает пресс-служба Главного управления МЧС России по краю.
Телефон «горячей линии» ГУ МЧС России по Красноярскому краю – (391) 275-16-17, телефон «горячей линии» ГУ МЧС России по Туве – (394-22) 231-42.
Как сообщает INTERFAX.RU, правительство Республики Тува собирается оказать материальную помощь пострадавшим и родственникам погибших в ДТП, т.к. все погибшие были жителями Тувы.
Прошедшей ночью глава Тувы Шолбан Кара-оол провел экстренное заседание комиссии по чрезвычайным ситуациям. Он сформировал рабочую группу во главе с секретарем Совета общественной безопасности Сергеем Монгушем, которая ночью оперативно выехала в район происшествия. В ее состав также вошли врачи центра медицины катастроф, заместитель мэра Кызыла Алексей Нестеров. Также в Боготол из Кызыла отправились автомашины для транспортировки тел погибших. По поручению главы республики мэрия Кызыла подготовила автобус для родных и близких, выезжающих в район ДТП. В сообщении указано, что их будут сопровождать психологи.

description.hltext_display: Buffalo Buckets will give free wings today
description.content:
Buffalo Buckets Wings & More is feeling the Christmas spirit.
The restaurant will give free buffalo wings for carry-out or dine-in from 5 to 9 p.m. today as "way of saying Merry Christmas and thank you for a wonderful year."
Everyone at the restaurant will receive five free wings. Customers may choose from the hot and famous or lemon pepper flavor.
In addition, 10 percent of all proceeds from today will be donated to the St. Vincent de Paul Society, Our Lady of Mount Carmel chapter.

description.hltext_display: Berlusconi sul legittimo impedimento: pronto alla piazza se la Consulta lo boccia
description.author: webinfo@adnkronos.com
description.content:
Roma - (Adnkronos) - Il premier: ''Se la Consulta farà una sentenza contro di me scenderò in campo e racconterò chi sono i giudici e come sono andate veramente le cose''. Sulle dichiarazioni rilasciate da Fini: sono ''incredibili''. Poi annuncia: ''Al Pdl cambierò nome ma non si torna a Fi''. : basta oscillare, ci sia un chiaro cambio di rotta. Casini: "Ora c'è un'area di responsabilità, niente bastone fra le ruote al governo" adnShowzone(5); Roma, 21 dic. - (Adnkronos) - "Noi riteniamo di poter allargare la maggioranza, ma ove non riuscissimo non ci sarebbe che tornare al popolo sovrano". Silvio Berlusconi intervistato da Matrix e Tg5 torna a ribadire la line del governo. Il ritorno alle urne, per il premier, "non farebbe bene al Paese perché ci sarebbe una campagna elettorale combattuta e un governo meno decisivo per governare. Sarebbe un male. Per questo noi speriamo di andare avanti altri due anni e mezzo, se no c'è il ritorno alle urne". adnShowzone(1); ALLARGAMENTO DELLA MAGGIORNAZA - "Questa maggioranza - spiega - sarà allargata a molti moderati. Contiamo che molti di loro vogliano aggiungersi o rientrando nel Popolo della libertà o fondando un altro gruppo che sarebbe di sostegno al Popolo della libertà e alla Lega". Comunque, dice il capo del governo, "con questi numeri si governa agevolmente, meno agevole è approvare le riforme indispensabili per il Paese".
NESSUN CALCIO MERCATO - Poi assicura ''non c'è stata nessuna compravendita, né abbiamo usato i 10 posti vacanti di governo. Chi è venuto in maggioranza lo ha fatto per profondo convincimento o, nel caso di Italia dei Valori, per l'impossibilità a restare in un partito con un leader di cui non ne potevano più". E per loro, in ogni caso, assicura, "non ci sarà nessun posto nel governo".
NON ESCLUDO PREMIER DONNA - Io comunque, avverte, ''lascerò solo quando gli italiani chiedereanno di sostituirmi''. E su chi verrà dopo di lui ''non escludo che un giorno ci possa essere donna premier'', dice.
FINI -Commentando le dichiarazioni rilasciate oggi da Fini secondo il quale ci sono le condizioni perché la legislatura continui, taglia corto: "Certamente queste dichiarazioni hanno dell'incredibile", visto che il 14 dicembre scorso Futuro e Libertà ha votato "una mozione di sfiducia nei miei confronti".
CASINI - Berlusconi ne ha anche per Casini che definisce un bilancio "in rosso" quello del governo: "E' la bugia più grande che io abbia pensato che lui potesse dire. Se c'è qualcosa in cui noi ci sentiamo orgogliosi sono certamente i risultati che abbiamo conseguito in questi anni". Quanto all': "Prendo atto dell'offerta''.
LA SINISTRA - Durissimo invece con la sinistra: "I possibili boss sono tutti capetti che si fanno la guerra l'un l'altro e nessuno riesce ad emergere" al contrario di quanto avviene ne centrodestra dove, ricorda anagrammando ancora una volta il suo nome, c'è l'"unico boss virile".
NAPOLITANO - Il Cavaliere torna invece a elogiare l'intervento del Capo dello Stato alla cerimonia dello scambio di auguri al Quirinale: "Tutte le persone di buon senso, a cominciare dal presidente Napolitano, si augurano che non ci una crisi della maggioranza".
LEGITTIMO IMPEDIMENTO - Quanto alla sentenza della Corte costituzionale sul legittimo impedimento Berlusconi avverte: "Se l'11 gennaio la Consulta farà una sentenza contro di me continuerò a governare. Ma mi difenderò, scenderò in campo e racconterò agli italiani chi sono i giudici e come sono andate veramente le cose. Io non temo questo giudizio, perché non ho commesso nessuno dei reati che mi vengono attribuiti. Se ci dovesse essere un giudizio contro di me - assicura il Cavaliere - in quel caso, andrò in tv, in aula e in piazza per fare vergognare chi mi accusa".
CRISI ECONOMICA - In tema di economia sfodera il consueto ottimismo. "Credo che ce la faremo. Io sono attento a che nulla si deteriori a che non si spendi di più e a tenere i conti pubblici sempre in ordine. Comunque la finanza italiana e internazionale crede e ha fiducia nell'Italia e nel suo sistema bancario''.
WIKILEAKS - Sul caso Calipari torna a smentire le nuove rivelazioni di Wikileaks. "Non c'è stata nessuna pressione da parte nostra. In più oggi è arrivata anche una conferma della Procura. Lo ripeto, da noi nessuna pressione". La diffusione dei files da parte del team di Assange, prosegue, ha fatto "molto male all'immagine degli Stati Uniti nel mondo e ha creato antipatie e risentimenti tra Paesi, una cosa non positiva".
RIFORMA GELMINI - In fine dedica alcune parole alla riforma universitaria sostenendo che "evidentemente dobbiamo comunicare meglio e spiegare agli studenti di piazza che questa riforma è favorevole proprio a loro. Non riesco a capire come si fa a protestare in piazza, mischiandosi anche con i centri sociali che producono violenza, visto che si tratta di una riforma che va a loro favore". Quanto all'approvazione definitiva prevista per il testo domani in Senato il premier è fiducioso sul via libera: "Mi sembra difficile pensare che chi prima ha approvato questa riforma, oggi, facendo degli spostamenti al terzo polo, possa votarla contro".
''CAMBIO NOME AL PDL'' - Quindi l'alluncio di un cambio di nome per il Pdl per le prossime elezioni. ''L'acronimo non emoziona, non commuove, non rende. Ed è possibile che possiamo cambiare il nome, ma non possiamo tornare a Forza Italia perché è alle nostre spalle. Restiamo tutti insieme come adesso nel Pdl, quindi andiamo avanti". Quindi ammette: "Io ce l'ho già in mente il nuovo nome, ma non dirò niente, prima lo devo depositare. Sarà un nome cortissimo, forse formato da una sola parola". Potrebbe essere Silvio? lo provoca il conduttore di Matrix. "Magari, ma più che altro dovrebbe essere forza Silvio".

description.content: (ANSA) - ROMA, 22 DIC - Quotazioni dell'oro in rialzo questa mattina. I prezzi del metallo prezioso con consegna immediata sono saliti dello 0,4% a 1.391,02 dollari all'oncia. Nel 2010 le quotazioni dell'oro hanno messo a segno un progresso del 27%.

description.hltext_display: BJP Must Not Forget It Has Skeletons in its Closet: Sibal
description.content:
Stepping up his attack on the BJP over the telecom policy pursued by its government in 1999, Telecom Minister Kapil Sibal today said the opposition party should not forget that they have skeletons in their closet.
Referring to his charge that the country had lost Rs 1.43 lakh crore during the NDA rule due to the changes it made in the telecom policy, Sibal said, "This is not to take revenge but to tell them that please look inwards before you start attacking institutions and destroying that very substratum of Parliamentary democracy".
Sibal had on Tuesday claimed that the government "actually" lost Rs 1.43 lakh crore in revenue in 1999 because of the then BJP-led NDA regime shifting to revenue share system from fixed license fee for telecom operations.
Asked whether his charge would be investigated, he said, "They have a lot of skeletons in their cupboard which is why I mentioned it (loss of Rs 1.43 lakh crore)".
He said he was only trying to highlight the issue of corruption which has become a "societal issue".
"Corruption is an issue in this country and it reflects in every layer of the society. The media is also not far away from it. The political class is not far away from it. The professional class is not far away from it. This is a societal issue which needs to be addressed holistically," he said.
BJP has dismissed Sibal's charges, saying the minister was "defending the indefensible" in the 2G spectrum scam.
"It is the worst kind of cover up," BJP spokesman Prakash Javdekar said reacting to Sibal's claim.

description.hltext_display: Ungersk mediekontroll fördöms
description.author: webmaster@nsd.se
description.content: Sedan det ungerska parlamentet natten till tisdagen ändrade författningen och införde en lag om statlig kontroll av press, radio, tv och internet möter den ungerska regeringen, som nästa vecka övertar EU-ordförandeskapet, mycket hård kritik från utlandet. Luxemburgs utrikesminister kräver att EU-kommissionen omedelbart agerar mot planerna och han ifrågasätter om Ungern är värdigt att leda EU.

description.hltext_display: Беспилотником можно управлять с телефона
description.content:
Аспиранты-математики Санкт-Петербургского государственного университета Наталья Граничина и Константин Амелин временно оставили научные лаборатории и успешно дебютировали в малой авиации. Они провели испытания нового беспилотника, которым управляли при помощи разработанной ими математической программы с многофункционального мобильного телефона, передает ИТАР-ТАСС.
Весной аспиранты получили грант в 1 миллион рублей для отладки системы управления летательными аппаратами от программы «Старт» Фонда содействия развитию малых форм предприятий в научно-технической сфере (фонда Бортника).

description.hltext_display: School district ducks state budget cuts
description.content:
Public Schools across the state should be able to follow this fiscal year's budgets absent fear of additional cuts, given a recent report from the New Mexico Department of Finance and Administration.
"That's for this year," cautions State Senator John Arthur Smith, D-Deming. "I think we should see ourselves clear through this fiscal year, this June, unless something totally collapses. It's going to have to be something severe."
Smith said government programs should likewise be safe from more cuts.
Danette Burch, secretary of Finance and Administration, said last week state revenues are expected to be about $56 million higher -- about 1 percent -- than previously thought, The Associated Press reported. The increase, The AP said, is mostly because of stronger sales tax reporting.
There are still predictions of a budget shortfall for next fiscal year.
Sate spending has been trimmed by 3.2 percent -- $151 million -- to balance the state budget this fiscal year, The AP said.
Burch told a legislative committee no additional cuts are needed now.
Deming Public Schools has not eliminated or trimmed programs, unlike many state school districts. Deming has held the line through the past decade, tightening its belt when needed by not filling positions vacated by retirements or personnel who left for jobs in other areas or because a spouse had employment in another location and also because individual schools paid close attention to their respective budgets and
expenditures.
"If, indeed, there are no cuts (this fiscal year)," said Deming Superintendent Harvilee Moore, "this will allow us to stay within our budget and not have to make cuts to services to children, or to staff -- so, it is good news. We don't have final word, so we'll wait to see."
"Good news," Ted Burr, DPS Associate superintendent of financial services said of the state budget outlook of which Burch spoke.
The picture down the road may not be as rosy. School districts have many positions filled American Recovery and Reinvestment funds. Absent money from that 2009 program, districts may find themselves in a tighter bind. Folks hired under that funding were aware it was a two-year window.
The state has so much of what is considered the operational fund -- day-to-day funding, Burr said - and that has continued to decline since recession started. If the difference covered by federal money can't be absorbed by local districts -- and other agencies, as necessary -- the budget-trimming issue again rises.
Moore, DPS Board of Education members and other district staff were in Albuquerque last week for the New Mexico School Board Association meeting, at which there were sessions on managing budgets, legal application of budget changes and how to stay within budget when budgets are continually cut.
Moore noted not all school funding comes from the same source, stating DPS has recently been notified by the New Mexico Public Education Department that it is withdrawing $67,000 from Deming's Transportation budget to help combat the state shortfall.
Kevin Buey can be reached at kbuey@demingheadlight.com.

description.content: ◇세아홀딩스＝이태성 외 1인의 장내매수로 최대주주 등 지분율이 82.81%로 0.18%포인트 상승.◇영원무역홀딩스＝채규태 씨의 장내매도로 최대주주 등 지분율이 58.52%로 0.01%포인트 하락.◇영원무역＝문홍우 씨의 장내매도로 최대주주 등 지분율이 50.53%로 0.02%포인트 하락.◇일동� �약＝이돈수 씨의 장내매도로 최대주주 등 지분율이 27.81%로 0.05%포인트 하락.◇� 흥＝종업원 상여금 지급을 위해 870만원 규모 자기주식 처분 결� �.◇경인양행＝김동길 씨의 장내매수로 최대주주 등 지분율이 42.89%로 0.08%포인트 상승.◇한솔LCD＝태양광 잉곳ㆍ웨이퍼 � 규투자 목� �으로 57억원 규모 � 규 시설 투자 결� �.◇웅진에너지＝삼성� �자와 410억원 규모 태양� �지용 � 순도 단결� � 웨이퍼 공급계약 체결.◇� � �개발＝지케이해상도로가 발행한 주식 중 490만주 투자자금 회수 목� �으로 처분 결� �.◇동양메이� �＝동양� �� �의 장내매수로 최대주주 등 지분율이 50.86%로 0.89%포인트 상승.◇중국원양자원� 한공사＝주당 0.01로 보통주 74만주 주식배당 및 주당 22원으로 16억원 규모의 현금배당 결� �.◇삼양� �넥스＝주식 � 동성 증대 및 투자자금 회수 목� �으로 보통주 4만주 30억원 규모의 자기주식 취득.◇우리금융지주＝WR인� 스트먼트를 계열회사에 추가.◇아이에스동서＝자사주 시간외매매로 최대주주 등 지분율이 74.31%로 2.22%포인트 하락.◇대림산업＝오산랜드마크프로� �트의 1110억원 규모의 채무보증 결� �.◇웰스브릿지＝원금 10억원, 이자 2억원 사채 원리금 미지급 발생.◇현대엘리� 이터＝현대로지� 의 장내매수로 최대주주 등 지분율이 50.70%로 0.61%포인트 상승.▶ [화보] "굴욕부터 NG까지"…2010 � �드카펫에서 생긴 일▶ 코스피, 연중 최� 치 행진 후 `숨� 르기`▶ `주가의 역설` PER 높을때 사야 돈번다▶ 한국증시 과속스캔들?…시가총액 증가율 세계 1위▶ 이세은, 반라로 목욕� 촬영 `매끈한 뒤태에 男心흔들`▶ `승승장구` 박진영, 이혼 후 첫 심경� 백 "그 사람에 대한 예의…"[ⓒ 매일경� � & mk.co.kr, 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: British Petroleum заключила сервисный контракт с HP на сумму свыше 400 млн долл.
description.content:
Согласно новому пятилетнему договору, компания HP будет заниматься оптимизацией и стандартизацией серверной инфраструктуры, консолидацией сервисов и внедрением инновационных технологий, в том числе «облачных» служб.
Компания HP уже предоставляет услуги Data Center Services европейскому ЦОД British Petroleum, расположенному на территории Великобритании. Теперь, аналогичные услуги (мониторинг, резервное копирование, восстановление, управление сайтами и поддержка сервисов, управление базами данных и ПО промежуточного слоя, пр.) будут оказываться также во всех ЦОД BP, расположенных на американском континенте. Кроме того, договор предусматривает развертывание корпоративных частных и публичных «облачных» служб, а также внедрение внешних «облачных» сервисов иных провайдеров.
Для повышения производительности и операционной целостности во всей корпоративной инфраструктуре BP будет использовать ПО HP Automation and Operations Orchestration. Компания HP также будет поддерживать отраслевые стандартизованные сервисы BP, а также инфраструктуру организации обслуживания клиентов Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) V3. Службы поддержки ЦОД будут предоставляться как на стороне клиента, так и из HP Best Shore, дислоцированных в Индии.

description.hltext_display: Reputable Developer Buys Unique, Traditional Houses for Sale in Mexico
description.content:
One of the most unique developments in Mexico currently available is just outside of the small town of Loreto in Baja California. The good news for buyers; the project was recently taken over by a very reputable developer. One of the most unique developments of currently available for retirement is just outside of the small and little-known town of Loreto in Baja California. The good news for buyers; the project was recently taken over by a very reputable developer. The development, located on Loreto Bay, a very short drive from the town of 10,000 residents, and even closer to that town's international airport, combines modern household conveniences, and community amenities with a charming design based on central Mexico's quaint, traditional little towns.
The development was given a very good start by a Canadian developer, creating the unique concept of a retirement-focused community with many activities and services, combined with Mexico's rich traditions of architecture and village atmospheres.
Recently, however, the entire development was purchased by another developer and added to the group of projects known as "Las Villas de Mexico" which also offers in other locations such as Cancun and Los Cabos. This group adds a very strong reputation and financial basis, offering buyers and investors further confidence to invest in this unique-concept community. "Las Villas del Mexico" has already begun to offer new condos, villas and homes within the master development, following the combination of modern convenience and traditional charm and design. New, pre-construction units are currently coming up for sale in excellent locations, directly on the beachfront, an only a short distance from existing amenities such as the golf course, beach club and exercise area.
Retirees and investors will be able to buy with complete confidence, knowing that further amenities will be added, and that new, upscale complexes will continue to appear, adding to the community's unique atmosphere. The development will continue the concept and theme a traditional Mexican village adapted to meet the needs of retirees from the U.S. and Canada.
Retirees looking for a unique way to enjoy retirement in a warm climate, with traditional charm and modern convenience nestled into to awe-inspiring desert and mountain landscapes of the Loreto area will do well to keep a close watch on these , ready for the opportunity to invest in a retirement like no other.
TOPMexicoRealEstate.com; Mexico's Leading Network of Specialists for Finding and Purchasing Mexican Properties Safely

BEIJING — Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale will star in the Chinese filmmaker's latest project about 13 young prostitutes struggling to survive during the attack by Japanese soldiers on Nanjing in 1937.
Zhang said Wednesday that Bale, the star of the boxing drama "The Fighter," will play an American priest in Nanjing during the Japanese invasion.
Zhang says shooting is to start Jan. 10. He says he hopes to tell the story of war atrocities in Nanjing, especially to younger people in Western countries.
Historians say the massacre, known in the West as the "Rape of Nanking," resulted in the slaughter of at least 150,000 civilians. China puts the number killed at 300,000, making it one of the worst atrocities of the World War II era.

description.hltext_display: Lone Democrat on Cache County Council moves on after two terms
description.content:
ALAN MURRAY Brian Chambers participates in a Cache County Council meeting last week. (Alan Murray/Herald Journal) By Charles Geraci The Herald Journal | 0 comments
After eight years serving on the Cache County Council, Brian Chambers is moving on.
The lone Democrat on the body, Chambers has represented residents in North Logan, Hyde Park and Smithfield since 2003. He made the decision not to seek a third term four years ago.
"I decided that shortly after I was re-elected to my second term," Chambers said. "I recycled my signs, and I gave my metal stands away. ... I've never had a second thought about that. I've felt good about it from the get-go, and I feel good about it today."
He realizes that many of his constituents do not normally vote Democratic, and he is grateful to them for giving him the opportunity to represent them on the council.
"I don't take for granted winning twice on the Democratic side of the ledger," he said. "I'm most appreciative of the people in those three cities that were very supportive of me."
Of all the decisions the County Council has made during his tenure, Chambers said developing a countywide ambulance system was "probably the most satisfying and meaningful." He noted that response times for residents living considerable distances from Logan have been shortened.
He is also proud of the council's decision to implement a mandatory recycling program a few years back.
"I'm pleased every other Thursday when those blue cans are out in North Logan city, and I know those are items that won't go to the landfill," he said.
Chambers, 70, comes from a political family. His father, Seth Chambers, was a former chairman of the Cache County Planning Commission. His older brother, Robert Chambers, served two terms in the 1970s on the County Commission form of government, which was in place prior to the current format. And his brother-in-law, Dennis Funk, served on the Cache County Council at its inception.
Before joining the council, Chambers spent about 35 years working in the Cache County School District, including several years as a social studies teacher at Sky View High School in Smithfield and six years as principal there, as well as nearly 13 years as principal of Cedar Ridge Middle School in Hyde Park.
Councilman Craig Buttars is one of Chambers' former students. He recalls coming late to class in the wake of his father's death when Buttars had a "heavy workload" milking cows before going to school.
"I had enough tardies that my grade was starting to get hurt," Buttars said. "When Brian found out what I was doing and why I had those tardies, he basically just sat me down and said, ‘I didn't realize what was going on,' and erased all the tardies that I had. And so I've had kind of a soft spot in my heart for Brian ever since that happened. He's a good man."
Councilman Craig Petersen said he and Chambers have had a close friendship for many years.
"I was delighted when he ran for the council. I've had a wonderful experience with him," Petersen said. "In fact, we kind of orchestrated being able to sit together this last year because we enjoy each other so much. He's been a great contributor to the council, and I'm going to miss him."
Chambers said he's looking forward to volunteering with his wife in the Temple Square area in Salt Lake City, noting they have a condo nearby.
Calling his time on the council a "special experience," Chambers concluded, "I have thoroughly enjoyed the people I've worked with - the members of the County Council, the other elected officials and the county employees."

description.hltext_display: A régóta várt lendülettel
description.content:
SMAFC-NYME-KanizsaKK DKG East 73-69(15-19, 19-17, 23-22, 16-11)Sopron, 150 néző. Jv.: Horváth A., Németh S., Németh A. NB I B-s férfi mérkőzés.Kovács S. (8), Hoffmann (8/3), Zsámár (4), Beck (2), Tóth (8/3). Csere: Babócsai (19/9), Stárics (10), Kovács D. (3/3), Fonai (7/3), Klír (-), Balogh (-). Edző: Farkas László.
Mindkét csapat nagy iramban kezdte a mérkőzést, ám a hazaiak érvényesítették az erejüket, s növelték az előnyüket. A vendégek viszont nem hagyták ezt annyiban, és Zsámár pontos találatával ismét átvették a vezetést. A folytatásban is fej fej mellett találtak be az alakulatok, de Babócsaiék nem hagyták magukat, s jól tartották a lépést a soproniakkal (15. p.: 21-22). Ekkor Kovács D. távolról talált be, míg Hoffmann közelről volt eredményes. Ezúttal a dél-zalaiak jól védekeztek, így a nagyszünet előtt, ha csak két ponttal is, de ők vezettek.
A fordulás után is a kanizsaiak akarata érvényesült, ám a hazaiak végig a nyomukban voltak. Az utolsó játékrészben aztán elfáradtak, és sokkal többet hibáztak a vendégek, így a soproniak előbb felzárkóztak, majd a vezetést is átvették. Az utolsó percek-re is maradt izgalom, ám végül a jobban koncentráló hazaiak nyertek.
A Kanizsa KK a tabella 8. helyéről várhatja a január 16-án a TF-Hegyvidék otthonában folytatódó bajnokságot.Babócsai, Stárics. Végre bátran játszottunk, s remélem, hogy ez a lendület a tavaszi folytatásra is megmarad.

description.hltext_display: ACNUR condena la repatriación forzosa de iraquíes cristianos
description.author: elmundo.es
description.content:
La agencia para los refugiados de la ONU expresó su consternación ante la repatriación forzada de iraquíes por parte los países europeos , incluyendo un hombre que escapó por poco de un ataque mortal en una iglesia de Bagdad.
"ACNUR reitera firmemente su llamamiento a los países para abstenerse de deportar a los ciudadanos iraquíes que proceden de los lugares más peligrosos del país", agregó Melissa Fleming, portavoz de la agencia.
En el último incidente, Suecia envió el pasado miércoles a un grupo de unos 20 iraquíes a Bagdad, entre ellos cinco cristianos originarios de la capital iraquí.
Amenazas de muerte
Fleming dijo que el personal del ACNUR en Bagdad entrevistó a tres de los cristianos y musulmanes que había en el grupo. Uno de los hombres cristianos, dijo que había escapado de Irak en 2007 después de que los grupos armados amenazaran con matarlo. Viajó por varios países en el Medio Oriente y Europa antes de llegar a Suecia, donde solicitó asilo.
Dijo que su solicitud fue rechazada en tres ocasiones en 2008 por no considerarse que había sufrido persecución personalizada. Las otras personas dijeron que sus solicitudes de asilo fueron rechazadas sobre la base de que la situación de seguridad en Irak había mejorado.
"Este retorno forzoso se produce en un momento en que nuestras cinco oficinas en Irak observan un aumento significativo de los cristianos que huyen de Bagdad y Mosul hacia la región del Kurdistán y la región de las llanuras de Ninewa [en el norte]", dijo Fleming.
Añadió que las comunidades cristianas en las dos ciudades habían iniciado un "éxodo lento pero constante" desde el atentado perpetrado contra una iglesia de Bagdad el 31 de octubre y posteriores ataques. Sesenta y ocho personas murieron durante el atentado en la iglesia de Nuestra Señora de la Salvación durante la misa dominical.
Unas 1.000 familias han llegado a la región del Kurdistán y Ninewa desde principios de noviembre. "Hemos escuchado muchos relatos de personas que huyen de sus hogares después de haber recibido amenazas directas. Algunos fueron capaces de llevar consigo sólo unas pocas pertenencias", dijo Fleming.
Además, las oficinas de ACNUR en Siria, Jordania y el Líbano están informando sobre un número creciente de cristianos iraquíes que llegan y contactan con ACNUR para registrarse y solicitar ayuda. Las iglesias y las organizaciones no gubernamentales han alertado al ACNUR que se preveen mas llegadas de gente que huye de Irak en las próximas semanas.
"Muchos de los recién llegados explican que este éxodo se debe al miedo por el ataque a la iglesia el pasado 31 de octubre. Un hombre, que ahora está registrado con ACNUR en Jordania, escapó por poco del ataque al haber salido de la iglesia minutos antes del atentado. Estos refugiados habían sido deportados de Europa tan sólo unos días antes", señaló Fleming.
ACNUR reconoce los esfuerzos que el gobierno iraquí está haciendo para tratar de proteger a todos sus ciudadanos, incluidos los grupos minoritarios vulnerables, como los cristianos.
Protección internacional
Fleming reiteró la posición de ACNUR, que pide que los solicitantes de asilo que vienen de Irak de las provincias de Bagdad, Diyala, Ninewa y Salah-al-Din, así como de la provincia de Kirkuk, no deben ser devueltos y deben beneficiarse de la protección internacional, ya sea como refugiados según el estatuto en la Convención sobre Refugiados de 1951 o mediante una forma complementaria de protección.
ACNUR considera que las graves violaciones de los derechos humanos que tienen lugar en algunas partes de Irak, incluyendo amenazas indiscriminadas a la vida, la integridad física o a la libertad como resultado de la violencia o serias alteraraciones del orden público son razones válidas para pedir protección internacional", subrayó la portavoz.

description.hltext_display: Idén is lesz futás
description.content:
Tizenöt esztendővel ezelőtt rendezték meg először az akkor hegyimaratonnak nevezett erőpróbát. Nem állítjuk, hogy csak szűk körben, de az biztos, hogy az évek során az indulói létszám alaposan megnőtt. A Zalatriatlon és a Deák SZKI mellé több szervezet (Aszfaltszaggatók SE, ZTC és persze az önkormányzat) is csatlakozott a rendezéshez, úgyhogy 2010. december 31-én a Deák SZKI elől 9 órakor újra elindul a mezőny, hogy Egerszeget ölelő dombokon át visszajusson a célba.
Az idén a szokottnál is később kaptuk meg a verseny kiírását, azonban Déri Miklós, a Zalatriatlon elnöke megnyugtatott bennünket (is): nem marad el a rendezvényük.
- Akadtak nehézségeink, de a lelkes rendezői gárda most is megoldotta ezeket, hiszen a költségeket valahogy ki kellett egészíteni - mondta el érdeklődésünkre Déri Miklós. - Egyébként már a kiírás elkészülte előtt voltak érdeklődők a nevezéssel és a pontos tudnivalókkal kapcsolatosan, hiszen mostanra már híre ment az országban is a szilveszteri egerszegi maratonnak. Van, aki számára az év méltó lezárását is jelenti ez az esemény, másoknak pedig az új év kezdetét, még akkor is, ha a futás egyébként az óévhez tartozik.
A nevezéssel és a létszámmal kapcsolatosan megtudtuk: a helyszínen, a rajt előtt lehet ezt megtenni, de előzetesen is, hiszen a kiírás az ismert futóhonlapokon is megtalálható. Déri Miklós azt sem rejtette véka alá: reméli, az idén is megdől a részvételi rekord.
- Minden esztendőben többen lettünk, most kétszáz-kétszázötven körüli indulóra számítunk - folytatta. - Annak örülök, hogy a Deák-szakközépiskola munkatársai önzetlen segítségére most is számíthatunk, különösen Rozmán Sándor igazgatóéra, aki amúgy is a szilveszteri futás ötletgazdája, s most is ott lesz a rajtnál...

description.hltext_display: Papírforma: Schmitt aláírta nyugdíjreform-törvényt
description.author: info@privatbankar.hu (Privátbankár.hu
description.content:
A köztársasági elnök aláírta a Nyugdíjreform és Adósságcsökkentő Alapról és a szabad nyugdíjpénztár-választás lebonyolításával összefüggő egyes törvénymódosításokról szóló jogszabályt, amelyet december 13-án fogadott el az Országgyűlés.
A Magyar Közlöny keddi számában közzétett törvény értelmében a magán-nyugdíjpénztári tagoknak január 31-ig dönteniük kell, hogy maradnak vagy belépnek az állami rendszerbe. Az Országgyűlés 250 igen, 58 nem szavazattal, 43 tartózkodás mellett fogadta el a szabályozást, a Fidesz és a KDNP mondott igent, nemmel voksoltak a szocialisták és az LMP-sek, a jobbikos képviselők pedig tartózkodtak.
A Ház a törvény sürgős kihirdetését kérte Schmitt Pál köztársasági elnöktől.

description.hltext_display: 심텍 다시봤어…키코 완전청산으로 주가 재평가 기대
description.content: 반도체용 인쇄회로기판(PCB)을 만드는 심텍이 490억원 규모 파생상품부채(키코)를 완� �히 청산했다. 심텍은 올해 말 이후 도래하는 통화옵션 상품의 잔여 환� � 물량 � �액인 2억2900만달러를 원ㆍ달러 평� 환율 1151원에 중도 청산했다� 지난 21일 공시했다.4분기에 환율이 소폭 올라 청산 거래비용 23억원이 발생했지만 키코가 재무� �표에 미치는 불확실성을 완� �히 � �거했다는 데 의의가 있다.매출의 30% 미만이므로 현금 흐름에 미치는 부� �� �인 영향은 없다는 게 회사 측 설명이다. 부채비율도 키코 손실 청산 � � 226%에서 195%로 줄어들 � �망이다.심텍 관계자는 "주주 가치와 회사 � 뢰도를 높이� 자 조기 청산을 결� �했다"며 "금융사 출자� �환과 같은 외부 도움은 받지 않� 자체 실� � 개� 과 자사주 매각으로 진행한 것"이라� 설명했다.� �체 매출에서 수출이 94%를 차지하는 심텍은 2008년 2분기 이후 환율 급등으로 장부상의 대규모 키코 평가손실을 입었� 2009년에는 일시� �으로 관리종목으로 지� �되기도 했다.하지만 이번 청산을 계기로 주가는 재평가� 것이란 분석이 나온다. 영업이익� 이 15%대에 육박하는 업체인 심텍 주가의 발목을 잡� 있던 요인이 � �거됐기 때문이다.우리투자증권은 심텍의 4분기 예상 매출액과 영업이익이 1523억원과 230억원으로 � �년 동기 대비 각각 13%, 54% 증가� 것으로 내다봤다.심텍 주가는 22일 � �일 대비 3.17% 오른 1만3000원을 기록했다.[서� 진 기자]▶ [화보] "굴욕부터 NG까지"…2010 � �드카펫에서 생긴 일▶ 코스피, 연중 최� 치 행진 후 `숨� 르기`▶ `주가의 역설` PER 높을때 사야 돈번다▶ 한국증시 과속스캔들?…시가총액 증가율 세계 1위▶ 이세은, 반라로 목욕� 촬영 `매끈한 뒤태에 男心흔들`▶ `승승장구` 박진영, 이혼 후 첫 심경� 백 "그 사람에 대한 예의…"[ⓒ 매일경� � & mk.co.kr, 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Ma este a Paks ellen
description.content:
A körmendi küzdelmes, helyenként jó játékot hozó találkozó után optimisták a megyeszékhelyiek. A fordulás utáni játékot illetően érthető, hogy a vereség ellenére is jobb a hangulatuk, hiszen nemcsak a védekezésben, a támadások hatékonyságában is sokat léptek előre az előző meccsekhez viszonyítva.
A hazai közönség is éhes már a sikerre, és biztos sokan foglalnak helyet majd a lelátón és buzdítják kedvenceiket. Jól is jönne a siker mert a sérülések miatt több alapemberét nélkülöző kék-fehérek - érthetően - közel sem olyan sikeresek, mint az előző esztendőben voltak.
Az ellenlábas Paks a legutóbbi körben remekelt, a bajnokság egyik esélyesét, a Szolnokot győzte le. Igaz, azt nem tudni, a nemzetközi szereplés miatt mennyire fáradtak a Tisza-partiak, de őket legyőzni még így is bravúr.

description.hltext_display: Jenks nightclubs get new rules
description.author: SUSAN HYLTON
description.content: JENKS - The City Council acted swiftly Monday night in responding to a compliance check at an "18 and older" riverfront nightclub last week that resulted in several arrests and citations. The council voted to start requiring large venues that sell low-point beer to have a security plan permit to operate. The permit would mandate a number of unarmed security officers and require that they be certified with the Council on Law Enforcement Education and Training. The police chief would have the authority to suspend the permit if the venue were out of compliance. City officials stressed that they want to make sure that patrons of the clubs and others going to the movies and other establishments at RiverWalk Crossing feel safe. Officials believe that the permit will apply to three large-capacity nightclubs, all at RiverWalk: The District, Midnight Rodeo and Twisted Tilt. Police Chief Don Selle said compliance checks were conducted at five clubs Thursday after officials received several complaints about underage drinking. The District was the only club at which violations were found, he said. Women age 21 or older were admitted free, and everyone 21 or older received free beer from 9 to 11 p.m. But the police investigation revealed that it wasn't difficult for patrons younger than 21 to get beer or for those younger than 18 to enter the club after paying a cover charge. The District was not asking patrons for identification, police records state. Officers identified eight 17-year-olds in the club and suspect that many more were present. Selle said the club was filled to its 750-person capacity, with dozens more waiting in line outside. Four people were arrested on allegations of public intoxication. Sixteen people were issued citations, including eight for curfew violations; four for resisting arrest; one for having a fake ID; and one for possessing drug paraphernalia. Bret Bisel, the club's general manager, was cited for contributing to the delinquency of a minor by serving beer to an underage patron, and Steve Kitchell was cited for permitting a patron younger than 18 inside the club. Police list Kitchell, who once operated several downtown Tulsa clubs, as the owner of The District, but Bisel said Kitchell is not the owner. The District's low-point beer license with Jenks and Tulsa County is listed under L.J.K. Investment, a limited liability company with a Tulsa post office box. As part of the security permit, the city is requiring the venue to disclose the full names of the owners - including anyone who owns more than a 25 percent interest in the business - and managers of the club. The clubs Kitchell operated in Tulsa included Studio 310, the Voodoo Room, First Street Alley, the Velvet Lounge, Bad Girls and Club Majestic. Kitchell was charged with a host of alcohol-related crimes in 2004, but the counts were later dismissed. His attorney argued that Kitchell couldn't be held responsible for actions of corporate employees that took place without his knowledge or consent. In 2005, he was arrested as a material witness in an effort to compel him to testify against two former bouncers who were charged in a Sept. 11, 2004, fatal attack on Scott Bolton in a downtown Tulsa parking garage. One of the bouncers was acquitted, and charges against the other were dismissed. Kitchell or his companies have been sued more than a dozen times by people who alleged that they were beaten by bouncers in his clubs. Mayor Vic Vreeland said Kitchell is more than welcome in Jenks if he runs a clean operation. Selle said: "The idea is not to shut them down. Our main concern is public safety. We want them to be safe when they're here and safe when they leave." Bisel said club operators "fully support" the new security plan ordinance. "The District currently employs four armed security guards and numerous other security personnel inside the venue," he said. Bisel would not comment on his citation for allegedly serving beer to an underage patron other than to say, "I do believe the outcome will be in my favor." City Councilor Allen Obert said security officers should be CLEET-certified to ensure that they are trained in crowd control and because it would give them accountability. "I'm not saying he (Kitchell) had bad security (at his Tulsa clubs), but he had bad stuff happen at his clubs," Obert said after Monday's meeting. "This is Jenks, and we love RiverWalk. We want our people to feel safe at RiverWalk, and it's up to him (Kitchell) to provide security." City Attorney Stephen Oakley said the security plan permits must be in place by Jan. 31. "As we become more and more a point of destination, we've got to address it," he said. Susan Hylton 581-8381 susan.hylton@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: Hatékonyabbá válni, képzések segítségével
description.content:
Az uniós forrásból megvalósuló terv részleteiről tegnap tartottak sajtótájékoztatót, melyen Kámán Ferenc, a ZMSE sportigazgatója előbb röviden vázolta az egyesü-lés felépítését és munkáját. Merthogy éppen a ZMSE, illetve a hozzá tartozó 29 sportági szakszövetségek életét, működését könnyítheti meg a tegnap bejelentett projekt. Ennek lényege pedig a következő: a napi munkában, illetve a versenyek szervezésében és megrendezésében adhat segítséget a nyelvi, illetve informatikai tanfolyamok által kínált lehetőség, hiszen az ő tevékenységük is hatékonyabbá válhat.
Mint elhangzott, azok vehetnek részt ezekben az ingyenes képzésekben, akik a szövetségekben töltenek be tisztségeket, s ami nagyon fontos, nemcsak a főállású alkalmazottak, hanem a társadalmi munkában ténykedők, illetve az önkéntesek.
A képzést közbeszerzési pályázati úton - amúgy a ZMSE is így jutott a tanfolyamok forrásához - elnyert Számpont Kft. ügyvezető igazgatója, Fejes Ágnes szerint izgalmas feladat lesz az ő számukra is ez a munka. Merthogy a most induló tanfolyamokon olyan emberek vesznek részt, akik saját ambícióból vállalják ezt és reményeik szerint ebből mindenki profitálhat, de leginkább a szövetségek: a nemzetközi kapcsolataik ápolásában és a napi feladataik során is. Tanfolyamokkal is segíthetik a sportban szerepet vállalókat

description.hltext_display: A fiatalabbak nyertek MINDENKI PROFITÁLHAT BELŐLE
description.content:
A hajdani legendás csatárra emlékeztek a térség tehetséges labdarúgóit felvonultató csapatok részvételével rendezett emléktornán. Mind a két mezőnyben csoportmeccsekkel kezdődtek a küzdelmek.
Az U15 mezőnyében a ZTE FC együttese nyert. 1. ZTE FC, 2. Pécsi MFC, 3 Kaposvár BFLA, Hévíz SK, 5. Grada Varasd, 6. UFC Nagykanizsa, 7. Nafta Lendva, 8. Pápa ELC.
A legjobb játékos Biró András (ZTE) lett.
Az idősebbek óriási küzdelmet vívtak, meglepően sok volt a döntetlen eredmény, végül a Kaposvár és a Pápa jutott a fináléba. Itt a somogyiak koncentráltak jobban, és övék lett a legjobbnak járó serleg. 1. Kaposvár, 2. Pápa, 3. ZTE FC, 4. NTE 1866, 5. Zala megye válogatottja, 6. Varasd, 7. Pécs, 8. Hévíz SK.
A legjobb kapus: Sárkány Norbert (Zala) lett.
A főszervező Bita József így fogalmazott:
- A bajnokság befejezését követően jó alkalom az ünnepek előtt a gyerekeknek amolyan levezetésre - kezdte a hajdani kiváló balszélső, aki csatártársa volt a rendkívül technikás és gólerős Szabó Rezsőnek. - A térség csapataiból rázódott össze a mezőny, az idén több zalai csapat állt rajthoz. A muraszombatiakat sajnáljuk, mert egy téves e-mail miatt lemaradtak a - jubileumi (tizedik) - rendezvényről. Az U15-ös csapatunknak viszont csak gratulálni tudok. Láttam több edzésüket, akkor nem mertem volna fogadni rá, hogy akár döntősök lesznek. Az elején valamennyi gárdánál dadogott a labda, de ahogy megszokták a fiúk a terem adta lehetőségeket, egyre jobban futballoztak. Jó hír, hogy a fiatalabbak között a mieink győztek.

Szavaztak a sportújságírók
description.content: Budapest (mti) - Berki Krisztián tornászt és Janics Natasa kajakost, a Janics, Kovács Katalin kajakpárost, Kiss László úszó szövetségi kapitányt, illetve Kovács Istvánt, Berki edzőjét választották az év legjobbjának a Magyar Sportújságírók Szövetségének 53. alkalommal kiírt szavazásán. A díjakat kedd este a Sportmax-Hegyvidék sportcsarnokban adták át.

description.hltext_display: Rep. Roscoe Bartlett Named Chairman of the Air and Land Forces Subcommittee of the House Armed Services Committee
description.content:
Washington, Dec 21 - Congressman Roscoe G. Bartlett, (R-6-MD), has been named Chairman of the Air and Land Forces Subcommittee of the House Armed Services Committee for the 112th Congress. Congressman Bartlett had served for the past two years as Ranking Member of the Air and Land Forces Subcommittee. He previously served six years as the senior Republican member of the Seapower and Expeditionary Forces Subcommittee. Republicans initiated and maintain a six-year term limit for committee leadership positions. “I am honored that my Republican colleagues have selected me as a leader in the Congress to craft national security policies for our Armed Forces,” said Congressman Bartlett.
Congressman Bartlett said, “I have devoted nearly four decades of my life to protecting the lives of the men and women in our military. As a scientist and an engineer, I focus on finding practical solutions to problems and challenges through collaborative partnerships.”
“Our most important duty as Members of Congress is to keep America safe,” added Congressman Bartlett. “I’ve spent eighteen years on the Armed Services Committee, including eight years as Chairman or Ranking Member of the Air and Land Forces and Seapower and Expeditionary Forces Subcommittees. More than anything else, I have fought to strengthen the U.S. military and the industrial base that supports it. I also have twenty years of professional experience working as a team leader or member on research and development programs for the military.
“I look forward to continuing to work with incoming HASC Chairman Howard P. “Buck” McKeon (R-CA). I also worked closely in the past session with incoming Ranking Member Adam Smith (D-WA) who most recently served as Chairman of the Air and Land Forces Subcommittee".
Assignments of members on subcommittees will be announced in January. The complete list of HASC Subcommittee Chairmen announced today includes:
• Air and Land Forces – Rep. Roscoe Bartlett, Maryland (bio)
• Military Personnel – Rep. Joe Wilson, South Carolina (bio)
• Oversight and Investigations – Rep. Rob Wittman, Virginia (bio)
• Readiness – Rep. J. Randy Forbes, Virginia (bio)
• Seapower and Expeditionary Forces – Rep. W. Todd Akin, Missouri (bio)
• Strategic Forces – Rep. Michael Turner, Ohio (bio)
• Terrorism, Unconventional Threats and Capabilities – Rep. Mac Thornberry, Texas (bio)
