description.hltext_display: Playa del Carmen Condos Model Suite Ready, PH Nears Completion
description.content:
Excellent news for Americans and Canadians buying Mexico condos on a budget; one new development of has recently completed its model unit, and the first penthouse unit is nearing completion. Excellent news for Americans and Canadians buying Mexico condos on a budget; one new development of has recently completed its model unit, and the first penthouse unit is nearing completion. When buying pre-construction, most buyers will want to see a completed model suite to visualize the lifestyle possibilities better. Seeing this model condo first hand will not leave buyers disappointed. The open-concept, modern design with a large kitchen bar, and 2 very spacious bedrooms with walk-in closets are as good, if not better, when seen first hand. The large space of 1400 sq. ft. (130 sq. mt.) is very well laid-out, with 2 large terraces, and a personal pool or jacuzzi as well. Each unit is a separate floor, and their are no adjoining units, making for plenty of natural sunlight and contributing to the open feeling.
The complex pool, shared by only 6 very small buildings, is also complete to be seen. The complex will also include a gym area, which will be completed with future building construction. The beach is only a short walk away, the newly developing community is upscale and gated, and downtown is a 10 minute drive.
What is most astonishing is the price; starting at $130,000, these are probably the best priced for sale in this kind of location with this much space and such an excellent design.
In the first building which is nearing completion and includes the model unit, the penthouse is also nearing completion for buyers to view. This unit, located on the third floor, includes the same design and all the benefits of the first two floors, with an additional bedroom on the rooftop. The remainder of the rooftop space is dedicated entirely to a terrace, ideal for a shaded lounge area. The jacuzzi is also included on the rooftop.
With plenty of extra space, and the luxury of a completely private rooftop terrace each penthouse will have a completely separate rooftop again it is surprising that the price is only $30,000 USD more than the base unit price. This total of $160,000 is the best price and value available for a penthouse in Playa del Carmen.
Located in a gated, upscale community, in an up-and-coming area of Playa del Carmen showing clear signs of becoming perhaps the nicest and most desirable part of town, these condos are an excellent investment, both in terms of lifestyle and in terms of potential for value appreciation.
TOPMexicoRealEstate.com; Mexico's Leading Network of Specialists for Finding and Purchasing Mexican Properties Safely

description.hltext_display: В 2010 г. объем выручки fabless-компаний превысит 59,6 млрд долл.
description.content:
Эксперты IC Insight прогнозируют, что в 2010 г. продажи тринадцати полупроводниковых компаний, не владеющих собственными производственными мощностями (fabless), превысят 1 млрд долл. В 2009 г. таких компаний было десять, а в 2008 г. – восемь. Прогнозируемый совокупный объем выручки тринадцати лучших IC-поставщиков превысит 41,4 млрд долл., что составит около 70% от всех ожидаемых доходов fabless-индустрии (59,6 млрд долл.) в 2010 г.
Девять из тринадцати компаний (Qualcomm, Broadcom, AMD, Marvell, Nvidia, Xilinx, Altera, LSI, Avago) имеют американские корни, однако уже в следующем году аналитики ожидает появление в рейтинге большего количества тайванских и китайских игроков.
Вершину рейтинга традиционно займет Qualcomm, продажи которой в 2010 г. превысят 7,1 млрд долл., увеличившись на 11% к предыдущему году. На вторую позицию поднимется Broadcom, ожидаемый объем выручки которой достигнет 6,5 млрд долл., увеличившись на 53% относительно 2009 г. Замкнет первую тройку AMD, в прошлом году вошедшая в число IC-компаний, не обладающих собственными производственными мощностями. Прогнозируемый доход чипмейкера в 2010 г. достигнет 6,4 млрд долл., увеличившись на 20% к 2009 г.

description.hltext_display: Man confesses to local murder
description.content:
A 20-year-old Deming man, Luna County Sheriff's Investigators said, Tuesday, has confessed to the Sunday, Dec. 12, killing of Timothy L. Bennish, 53.
"He just said he made a mistake," Capt. Arturo Baeza said of Austin Barshaw, of the 8700 block of Mesa Vista.
Barshaw was booked at Luna County Detention Center on an open count of murder, tampering with evidence, robbery, bribery or intimidation of a witness and larceny of a firearm. The firearm, which was Bennish's, is believed to be the murder weapon. Detectives recovered a firearm, which was buried near Barshaw's home. Ballistics will determine if it is the murder weapon. Baeza said the murder weapon was a medium-caliber weapon. He didn't release more details.
Bennish died at about 7:30 p.m. in his fifth-wheel trailer home at 2780 Silver City Highway.
A neighbor who had noticed Bennish's door open at about 9:30 p.m. found Bennish face down in a pool of blood and summoned investigators.
The LCSO, last Friday, reported Bennish died as the result of a gunshot to the head. Earlier, the department reported a paramedic noticed blunt force trauma to the head when medical technicians responded to the scene.
The LCSO had a DWI checkpoint Dec. 12 on Silver City Highway and said Barshaw went though it, about a mile-and-a-half from Bennish's home, far enough from the checkpoint that a gunshot wasn't heard.
Barshaw was accompanied by another man, the LCSO said. His name was not released, but it is he whom Barshaw allegedly
bribed or intimidated. The investigation continues, Baeza said, to determine if the other man was more than a witness or if anyone else was involved.
Baeza said Barshaw knew Bennish through a third party.
Barshaw was arrested at his home without incident just after midnight. "We activated SWAT," Baeza said. "We didn't know how he'd react. The house was dark. We called him on the phone."
Calls were unanswered. Baeza hailed Barshaw on an LCSO vehicle public address system and Barshaw came to the door.
Baeza said there apparently was no argument preceding Bennish's shooting, but said the men had smoked some pot at Bennish's trailer.
"'I don't know why I did it,'" Baeza quoted Barshaw. "'I made a big mistake.'"
Baeza said detectives interviewed and re-interviewed numerous people and Monday reviewed compiled information, then sought a warrant for Barshaw's arrest.
Patrol Deputies, SWAT, LCSO Criminal Investigators and State Police Investigator Norman Rhodes were involved in the investigation. Gerald Byers, of the Sixth Judicial District Attorney's Office, was often present.
Kevin Buey can be reached at kbuey@demingheadlight.com.

description.hltext_display: V.Lingio žudiką I.Achremovą teisme užtarė dvasininkas ir kalinių draugijos atstovas (Kriminalai)
description.content:
BNS ir lrytas.lt inf.
Į laisvę septintą kartą anksčiau laiko besiekiantį išeitį žurnalisto Vito Lingio žudiką Igorį Achremovą trečiadienį teismo posėdyje užtarė dvasininkas ir Lietuvos kalinių globos draugijos atstovas.
I.Achremovas vėl bando ištrūkti į laisvę. P.Lileikis
REKLAMA
Vilniaus miesto 3-iasis apylinkės teismas nagrinėjo I.Achremovo prašymą dėl lygtinio paleidimo iš 2-ųjų pataisos namų.
Stačiatikių kunigas, Šventosios dvasios vienuolyno dvasininkas Vitalijus Mockus teisme sakė, kad nuteistasis pasikeitė kaip žmogus.
„Tai vienas iš retų atvejų, kai žmogus šitaip pasikeičia, ir neatkreipti į tai dėmesio, jo nepaskatinti būtų nehumaniška. Juk visa bausmių sistema yra tam, kad žmogus pasitaisytų,o ne tam, kad būtų izoliuotas kaip žvėris“, - posėdyje tvirtino dvasininkas.
Pasak V.Mockaus, tokio parapijiečio galėtų pavydėti kiekvienas kunigas, o šešerius metus su juo bendraujantis I.Achremovas yra visiškai pasiruošęs į laisvę.
Lietuvos kalinių globos draugijos atstovas Vaidotas Jakubonis kalbėjo, kad jei ne nusikaltimo žinomumas, I.Achremovas jau būtų paleistas - jis yra visiškai pasikeitęs ir į laisvę išėjęs daugiau nenusikalstų.
I.Achremovo advokatė Gitana Šimkutė tvirtino, kad ši lygtinio paleidimo byla jau yra tapusi rezonansinė ir joje yra atsižvelgiama tik į prokurorų nuomonę. Ji taip pat tikino, kad nuteistojo paleidimas nesukeltų neigiamos visuomenės reakcijos.
Pasak advokatės, buvęs generalinis prokuroras, dabar - Lietuvos Aukščiausiojo Teismo teisėjas Antanas Klimavičius rudenį laiške I.Achremovui yra rašęs, kad būtent dėl nuteistojo bendradarbiavimo pavyko išnagrinėti V.Lingio nužudymo bylą, ištirti kitus vadinamosios „Vilniaus brigados“ nusikaltimus.
I.Achremovo teikimą pristatęs Vilniaus 2-ųjų pataisos namų atstovas Pavelas Srebniukas sakė, kad pataisos namų režimą nuteistasis buvo pažeidęs vos vieną kartą, 16 kartų skatintas už gerą elgesį, charakterizuojamas teigiamai, šiuo metu dirba ūkio aptarnavimo brigadoje, daug dėmesio skiria savo lavinimuisi, yra perlaikęs brandos egzaminus, verčia iš anglų ir rusų kalbos, skiria lėšas gyvūnų priežiūros organizacijai, nors yra išsiskyręs, susitinka ir skiria lėšų sūnui.
Vilniaus miesto apylinkės prokuratūros prokurorė Danutė Kisinienė teisme tikino, kad I.Achremovas neturėtų būti paleistas į laisvę, nes jis yra nubaustas už labai sunkius nusikaltimus, jo kalinimo sąlygos buvo ne kartą švelnintos, bausmės laikas trumpintas.
„Iš tikrųjų formalias sąlygas taikyti lyg ir galima būtų, bet reikia vertinti aplinkybių visumą“, - tvirtino prokurorė.
Pasak teisėsaugininkės, išleidus V.Lingio žudiką, būtų neįgyvendinti bausmės tikslai.
Apylinkės teismas verdiktą turėtų skelbti ketvirtadienį.
Už dienraščio „Respublika“ žurnalisto V.Lingio nužudymą, įvykdytą 1993 metų spalio 12 dieną Vilniuje, 1994-ųjų rudenį buvo nuteisti „Vilniaus brigados“ vadeiva Borisas Dekanidzė ir trys jo parankiniai - I.Achremovas, Viačeslavas Slavickis bei Borisas Bobičenka.
B.Dekanidzei teismas skyrė išimtinę mirties bausmę, kuri buvo įvykdyta. I.Achremovui taip pat skirta mirties bausmė, tačiau tuo pačiu nuosprendžiu ji pakeista į laisvės atėmimą iki gyvos galvos.
2004 metų sausį Vilniaus apygardos teismo sprendimu, nuteistajam laisvės atėmimo bausmė sumažinta iki 25 metų. Remiantis šia nutartimi, į laisvę jis turėtų išeiti 2018 metų pabaigoje.

description.hltext_display: Two Canadians among latest Carnegie hero award recipients
description.author: The Canadian Press
description.content:
PITTSBURGH, Pa. - One battled roaring flames, another fought off a stabbing attack — both risked their own lives to save strangers.
Michael Sharpe of Spruce Grove, Alta., and Gheorghita Rusu of Ottawa are the two Canadians among 21 people to receive the latest Carnegie medals for heroism.
In September last year, Sharpe braved roaring flames and suffered a third degree burn to save a man from a burning tractor-trailer that rolled over on an Alberta highway.
Sharpe saw the accident happen and rushed to pull driver Marc Bissonnette from the cab of the flaming tractor .
In November last year, 25-year-old Rusu fought a knife wielding assailant — and was stabbed in the chest — as he helped rescue a female letter carrier who was being stabbed repeatedly.
Forty-six-year-old letter carrier Brenda Van Leyen was approaching the rear of a pharmacy on her route when a man forced her to the ground and began to stab her repeatedly.
Rusu, the pharmacy's assistant manager, heard her screams, rushed to the scene and grabbed her attacker from behind and pushed him against a wall. The man then struck out at Rusu, stabbing him in the chest.
Both Rusu and Van Leyen required hospital treatment, but recovered.
The Pittsburgh-based Carnegie Heroes Fund was started in 1904 by steel baron Andrew Carnegie, who was inspired after hearing rescue stories from a mine disaster that killed 181 people. Since then, more than US$32.9 million has been awarded to 9,412 people.

description.hltext_display: Gemeenten kochten amper meer zout in dan vorig jaar
description.content:
AMERSFOORT - Zoutleverancier Akzo Nobel zegt dat gemeenten nauwelijks meer strooizout hebben ingekocht dan vorig jaar. De aanhoudende sneeuw zorgde toen voor flinke zouttekorten. Dat is vandaag te lezen in het AD.
Veel gemeenten zijn volgens Akzo Nobel nu al over de helft van hun voorraad. Daar kunnen ze overigens niet vrij over beschikken. Ze reserveren een hoeveelheid zout en kunnen daar steeds een deel van opvragen. Inmiddels wordt er in rantsoenen geleverd. Gemeenten die te weinig hebben gereserveerd moeten achteraan in de rij aansluiten.De gemeenten beschuldigen Rijkswaterstaat van het inpikken van het zout, maar volgens Rijkswaterstaat zijn ze zelf verantwoordelijk voor hun inkoop.ZoutlokettenVeel gemeenten die klagen over een tekort aan strooizout hebben zich nog niet gemeld bij het zoutloket in hun regio. De zoutloketten fungeren als een soort zoutverdelingsstations in geval van een landelijk zouttekort. Gemeenten kunnen dan meeliften bij de inkoop van zout door Rijkswaterstaat, dat zelf voorlopig nog voldoende zout heeft. Deze winter is tot nu toe zo'n negentig ton zout gestrooid door Rijkswaterstaat. Vorig jaar eindigde de teller op 191 ton zout.� De zoutloketten zijn nog niet 'actief', maar veel gemeenten zeggen wel hard door hun voorraad te gaan. Nieuw zout zou niet te krijgen zijn omdat Rijkswaterstaat alles gebruikt om op de snelwegen te strooien. Volgens Rijkswaterstaat is dat onzin, omdat gemeenten hun eigen voorraad moeten inkopen. (CBR)

description.hltext_display: Gamtos mylėtojai protestuoja prieš didinamą vilkų medžioklę (nuotraukos) (Gamta)
description.content:
BNS ir lrytas.lt inf.
Trečiadienį prie Aplinkos ministerijos Vilniuje gamtos apsaugos asociacija „Baltijos vilkas“ surengė protesto akciją prieš, anot jos, beatodairiškai didinamą vilkų medžioklę.
Vilkų medžioklės sezonas trunka iki balandžio 1-osios. V.Balkūnas
REKLAMA
Vilkų medžioklės kvotų didinimu nepatenkinti visuomenininkai gruodžio pradžioje prezidentei Daliai Grybauskaitei įteikė 8 tūkst. žmonių pasirašytą peticiją, kurioje prašoma sustabdyti vilkų medžioklę Lietuvoje.
Gruodžio 1-ąją Lietuvoje prasidėjo 2010-2011 metų vilkų medžioklės sezonas. Šiemet leidžiama nušauti 60 vilkų. Tai yra 20 žvėrių daugiau nei pernai arba trigubai daugiau nei prieš trejus metus.
Vilkų medžioklės kvotos pastaraisiais metais didinamos nuolat: 2008-2009 metais sumedžiota 30 vilkų, nuo 2005 iki 2007 metų - 20 šių žvėrių.
Anot visuomenininkų, lyginant Vyriausybės pateiktus duomenis, 2002-ųjų ir šių metų informaciją, vilkų Lietuvoje sumažėjo beveik perpus. Derybinėje pozicijoje dėl stojimo į ES nurodyta, kad Lietuvoje vilkų yra 550, ir jų medžiojimas esą neturės įtakos populiacijos gyvybingumui, tuo metu dabar apskaityta 250 vilkų, teigia nevyriausybinės organizacijos.
Aplinkosaugos nevyriausybinės organizacijos piktinasi, kad Aplinkos ministerija nesistengia paaiškinti neatitikimo tarp mažėjančios populiacijos ir kasmet didinamų medžioklės kvotų.
Visuomenininkai teigia, jog vilkų medžioklė uždrausta daugumoje ES šalių, išskyrus Baltijos šalis, Rumuniją, Bulgariją, Slovakiją.
Vilkų medžioklės sezonas trunka iki balandžio 1-osios.

description.hltext_display: La nieve obliga a circular con cadenas en tres altos de la provincia de León
description.content:
Los copos de nieve caídos y acumulados en las últimas horas obligan a usar cadenas en estos momentos en tres altos de montaña de la provincia de León, según los datos aportados por la Dirección General de Tráfico (DGT) y recogidos por Europa Press.
Tu nombre Email destino
Enviado
VALLADOLID, 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
Los copos de nieve caídos y acumulados en las últimas horas obligan a usar cadenas en estos momentos en tres altos de montaña de la provincia de León, según los datos aportados por la Dirección General de Tráfico (DGT) y recogidos por Europa Press.
En concreto, son necesarias las cadenas para circular por los altos de Las Señales (LE-333), San Isidro (LE-331) y Ventana (LE-481), todos ellos en la provincia de León.
Además, la nieve dificulta la conducción en la LE-233 en Besande, en la LE-493 en Murias de Paredes y en la LE-481 en Torrebarrio.
Por su parte, los bancos de niebla merman la visibilidad en la CL-505 en Tordanizos de Ávila y en la N-502 en Villarejo del Valle, en la provincia de Ávila, y en la N-I en Briviesca, Cubo de Bureba y Monasterio de Rodilla, en la provincia de Burgos, donde también está afectada la AP-1 también en Monasterio de Rodilla.
También hay niebla en la N-VI en El Espinar (Segovia).

description.hltext_display: Kevesebbet vásárolunk és tankolunk
description.author: info@privatbankar.hu (Privátbankár.hu
description.content:
Az országos kiskereskedelmi üzlethálózatban, valamint a csomagküldő kiskereskedelemben 2010 októberében 666 milliárd forint értékű árut forgalmaztak, az év első tíz hónapjában összességében 6050 milliárd forint forgalom realizálódott. A kiskereskedelmi eladások 44%-a élelmiszer- és élelmiszer jellegű vegyes-, 18%-a üzemanyag-, 14%-a bútor-, háztartásicikk-, építőanyag-kiskereskedelmi üzletekben bonyolódott; a többi üzlettípus együttes részesedése 24% volt 2010. január–októberben.
Az élelmiszer- és élelmiszer jellegű vegyes kiskereskedelmi üzletek 2010. októberben 1,3%-kal, az első tíz hónapban 2,4%-kal kisebb volumenű forgalmat bonyolítottak, mint előző év azonos időszakában. Az eladások jelentős részét (90%-át) lebonyolító vegyes termékkörű üzletek (hiper- és szupermarketek, vegyesboltok) eladásai 1,7%-kal csökkentek októberben. A szezonális és naptárhatástól megtisztított adatok szerint az élelmiszer- és élelmiszer jellegű vegyes kiskereskedelem októberi volumene lényegében nem változott az előző hónaphoz képest.
A KSH adatai szerint a nem élelmiszer-kiskereskedelem értékesítésének volumene lényegében nem változott 2010. októberben, így összességében az év első tíz hónapjában az eladások 1,8%-kal maradtak el az előző év azonos időszakitól. 2010. októberben a legtöbb üzlettípus változatlan áras forgalma meghaladta az előző év azonos havit, kisebb elmaradás csak a könyv- újság- papíráru és egyéb iparcikk valamint a textil-, ruházati és lábbeli üzletekben és a gyógyszer-, gyógyászati termék kiskereskedelemben volt. A szezonális és naptárhatástól megtisztított adatok szerint a nem élelmiszer-kiskereskedelem eladásai lényegében nem változtak az előző hónaphoz képest.
Az üzemanyagtöltő állomások forgalmának volumene 2010. októberben 1,5%-kal, az év első tíz hónapjában 5,5%-kal csökkent az egy évvel korábbi azonos időszakhoz képest. A szezonális és naptárhatástól megtisztított adatok szerint az októberi eladások 1,1%-kal meghaladták az előző havit.
Az Eurostat gyorsbecslése szerint – a naptárhatástól megtisztított adatok alapján – 2010 októberében az Európai Unió 27 tagállamában valamint az eurózóna országaiban 1,8–1,8%-kal növekedtek a kiskereskedelmi eladások az előző év azonos időszakához képest. Az európai statisztikai rendszerben a kiskereskedelembe nem számító gépjármű- és járműalkatrész-üzletek eladásai 9,3%-kal haladták meg az előző év azonos időszakit, így összességében az év első tíz hónapban még így is 13,5%-os volt az elmaradás - olvasható a KSH jelentésében,

description.hltext_display: Govt exerts pressure on Google
description.content:
With Nokia succumbing to pressure and recently setting up its email server in New Delhi for government authorities to snoop, the Union Home Ministry, which has tasted blood, is now exerting pressure on Google Inc to share Gmail's encryption keys.
"Yes, the Union Home Ministry is in talks with Google. In case of emergencies like terrorism, we need to have a mechanism to read suspect emails," said Union Home Secretary G K Pillai.
However, Google India's head of products, Vinay Goel, claimed, "We have not received any communication from the government. We are keen on securing user privacy.
In the past, whenever there have been requests, we have worked with the government on a case-to-case basis within the legal framework."
Specifically asked if Google is in talks with the government, Goel said, "I can't comment on any talks with the government."
Incidentally, New Delhi-based cyber law expert Pawan Duggal said that the 2008 amendment to the Information Technology Act, 2000, is draconian as it gives the government carte blanche to do whatever it feels like.
Not only that, the IT Act empowers the government to act if any computer or network physically located in India is affected, even though the company or service provider is located abroad.
"In India, there is no specific law dedicated to privacy. The Supreme Court has stated that Right to Privacy, covered by Article 21 of the Indian Constitution, is a fundamental right to life.
But the 2008 amendment made to the IT Act 2000, gives the government unprecedented powers of monitoring, intercepting and even blocking Internet communication in the interests of national security, protecting friendly relations with foreign countries, and in the face of perceived threats to public order.
Threat to public order could mean just about anything, even something very minor, since it is not clearly defined," said Duggal.
"Well, the Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In) in Delhi is the government body which is authorised to implement such government orders.
If the service provider's servers are physically located abroad, it will depend on the ruling government's political will to enforce Indian laws," Duggal added.
When Union Home Secretary G K Pillai was asked how the government could violate the privacy of such a huge number of citizens who are Gmail users, he said, "There has to be a mechanism for emergencies.
Out of the several million email IDs, we may have to read only a few hundreds, which are suspect. I feel that is okay. In any case, that is the trend all over the world. Besides, it is allowed by the law."

description.hltext_display: Hulu has decided to put off its plan for an IPO
description.content:
and this is your first early morning digital briefing. If you would like to read this or any other Cynopsis edition online, click here.
The FCC voted along party lines to approve a set of regulations to preserve the open nature of the internet. The rules, which are set to be published later this week and will take effect in early 2011 (the FCC provided key excerpts on Tues.), will prohibit fixed lined ISPs from blocking access to sites and applications they are not affiliated with, including bandwidth-hungry services like Netflix or other over-the-top providers seen as palpable threats to existing pay TV models. But they offer fewer protections for wireless broadband customers. Comcast, the nation's largest cable MSO, welcomed the rules as a "workable balance" between marketplace and individual users' needs. Consumer interest groups and industry guilds such as Public Knowledge and the WGA, East were less receptive. Verizon released a statement suggesting the FCC has overreached its authority, opening the door for a legal challenge. and may pursue other options to raise additional cash including hitting up its existing network partners, according to the WSJ. The entertainment video site is also considering additional subscription options after rolling out the $8/mo. Hulu Plus service. The company has said it expects to clear $260 million in revenue for 2010.
Foursquare introduced a new feature to its iPhone app that allows users to add photos and comments from the restaurants and shops they check into. The push notification option will alert you when friends leave comments. An Android version of the update is due out later this week while a BlackBerry version is coming in Jan.
~ DIGITAL ADVERTISING ~
The Mobile Marketing Association announced it is developing a series of mobile privacy guidelines to help marketers maintain transparency and adhere to industry accepted standards and practices with their ads. The MMA is forming a Privacy Committee to address the issues and is inviting media companies, mobile carriers, marketers, agencies and media technology providers to participate.
Overall online ad spending will top (print and online) newspaper ad spending in 2010 for the first time and the gap will widen even further next year, according to eMarketer. Total newspaper spending, including ads in print and online editions, will fall to $25.7 billion in 2010, a decline of 6.6%. A rise of 13.9% will push US online ad spending up to $25.8 billion by year's end.
The recently formed Mobile Content Venture plans to upgrade stations to deliver mobile digital TV signals in a total of 20 markets during the second half of 2011 covering 40% of the U.S. population, including LA, Chicago and Orlando, reports the Chicago Tribune. The service is delivered via digital broadcast signals instead of wireless broadband and is currently offered by some 70 stations.
The advent of HTML5 and new tablet devices have increased mobile video viewing significantly, increasing mobile video traffic by 60% overall in 2010, according to new research released by multimedia search engine MeFeedia. iPhone & Android led all mobile platforms in delivering mobile video with a 26% and 21% share, respectively, of the global market. Apple's iOS accounted for around 52% of overall mobile traffic (including the iPod traffic, which was excluded from the rankings,) down from 64% in April. iPad traffic has increased 325% since April.
Video Usage by Mobile Device - Dec. 2010
Platform % of video traffic
iPhone 26%
Android 21%
iPad 17%
Symbian OS 16%
Blackberry 9%
Nokia 4%
Samsung 4%
Sony 2%
Windows 1%
Source: MeFeedia
Although DVR penetration has now reached 38% of U.S. homes, viewers do continue to watch commercials on their DVRs, lifting commercial ratings by 44% among 18-49 year olds when tracking viewing 3 days out, according to a new DVR usage report from Nielsen. DVR playback after 7 days added 2.29 rating points to total day usage levels during the '09-'10 season. Most DVR playback occurs in primetime (34%), peaking at 9p (12%) and 10p (13%). The top ranked time shifted programming genre this season was Sci Fi, receiving a 1.3 ratings lift from +7 day viewing. Predictably, DVR homes are more likely to be upper income and under the age of 45.
~ GADGETS & APPS ~
Look ma, no glasses. Toshiba is planning to launch a 12" screen 3D TV in Japan this week which require no glasses and the company will come out with a 40" model as early as next April, reports the WSJ. A U.S. launch of the TVs, which will be demoed at CES in Jan., are expected later next year.
The newly revamped, hard-drive free Apple TV device will top 1 million units in sales this week, Apple announced. The company recently introduced an update to the iOS operating system that integrates iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch content with the device.
Mobile content provider HipLogic is launching a new real-time personalized mobile portal dubbed "Spark" for Android and Symbian smartphones that aggregates real time content from multiple partners including CBS News, Twitter, Facebook, Sky (UK), Weatherbug and Groupon. The module is currently available for free in 8 languages in beta format at sparkmyphone.com.
Watercolor painting on the iPad is now possible with a new Auryn Ink app that is being offered for free through the holidays. Pigment blending simulates the way wet pigments mix together and separates dry layers from glaze effects. The app also allows you to control the amount of water on the brush, which influences flow effects.
Keep up with the super rich with the new Forbes Lists iPad app, offering access to the magazine's annual ranking of the 400 richest Americans.
History has launched a new Facebook app that allows fans of American Pickers to choose among 3 T-shirt designs to be created and made available for sale exclusively on Facebook. Fans vote by clicking on the "shop" tab on the original series' fan page.
Michael Montgomery has been promoted to VP/Ad Sales for REVShare, the performance-based TV technology company owned by the Carlyle Group. He is based in the company's Temecula, CA headquarters and reports to Brendan Condon, CEO.
As Hulu struggles to come up with a business model that makes sense, its network partners continue to rely on their own websites to help maintain fans' interest in shows when they're on hiatus. NBC.com, which is likely to soon come under the management of Comcast, has done a great job of utilizing clips such as skits from Saturday Night Live to drive traffic but has always limited full episode catch-up viewing to 5 episodes for current shows. For the holiday break once again, season-to-date episodes are being offered for a number of newer shows including "The Event," "Parenthood," "Outsourced" and "Law & Order Los Angeles." (Supporting programming for "The Event" will also include exclusive Deleted Scenes and Commentary from Show Creator Nick Wauters.) The move makes sense, given how tough it is to maintain viewer loyalty after a show goes off the air for weeks. But it would make even more sense if these shows were available on multiple platforms, like a full episode iPad app that NBC once seemed interested in but has since stepped back from. (A source at NBC says there will be a couple of iPad-related announcements after Christmas, so stay tuned.) Maintaining viewer interest means offering access via whatever platform users are most likely to use.
Later -
Wayne Karrfalt for Cynopsis Digital
12.22.10

description.hltext_display: Bestatter wegen Mordes verurteilt
description.content: Hof/Selb – Wegen Mordes an seiner Ehefrau ist ein Bestatter vom Landgericht Hof zu einer lebenslangen Freiheitsstrafe verurteilt worden. Nach Überzeugung des Gerichts hatte der 49-Jährige seine Frau Ende Oktober des vergangenen Jahres im Keller des gemeinsamen Hauses in Selb mit einem Holzscheit erschlagen. Anschließend schaffte er die Leiche der 50-Jährigen in den Wald und zündete sie an. Der Angeklagte hatte wenige Monate zuvor eine junge Frau kennengelernt, mit der er ein neues Leben beginnen wollte. Zudem wollte er mit dem Hausverkauf und dem Geld aus der Lebensversicherung seine finanziellen Probleme lösen.

description.hltext_display: 키움운용, 뜨는 업종 집중투자 펀드 출시

description.hltext_display: Gerichte fürchten Hartz-IV-Klagewelle
description.author: Marion van der Kraats, dpa
description.content:
Kein neues Gesetz bis zum 1. Januar - Hartz IV Prozesse könnten auf Kosten anderer Prozesse gehen - vor 42 Minuten
Potsdam - Bleibt ein kurzfristiger Kompromiss für das Hartz- IV-Paket aus, sieht die Präsidentin des Landessozialgerichts Berlin- Brandenburg, Monika Paulat, schwarz.
Die Präsidentin des Landessozialgerichts Berlin-Brandenburg, Monika Paulat, sieht schwarz, wenn es nicht zu einem Kompromiss für das Hartz-IV-Paket kommt.
Foto: dapd
Die Präsidentin des Landessozialgerichts Berlin-Brandenburg, Monika Paulat, sieht schwarz, wenn es nicht zu einem Kompromiss für das Hartz-IV-Paket kommt.
Foto: dapd
Links zum Thema
Schwierige Kompromisssuche bei Hartz-IV-Reform
Das Saarland stoppt die Hartz-IV-Reform - vorerst
Hartz-IV-Falle: Aufgeben gilt nicht
Weitere Meldungen aus der Politik
„Den Gerichten droht eine Flut von Anträgen der Leistungsempfänger auf einstweiligen Rechtsschutz. Das würde ganz klar zulasten von anderen Verfahren gehen“, sagte Paulat in Potsdam. Da es sich bei den Hartz-IV-Verfahren um Eilsachen handele, hätten diese Vorrang vor anderen Klagen – beispielsweise zur Renten- oder Krankenversicherung.
„Beides sind aber ebenfalls Bereiche, in denen es um die Sicherung der Existenz geht“, betonte Paulat, die auch Präsidentin des Deutschen Sozialgerichtstages ist. Die Bearbeitungszeit für Klagen von Krankenversicherten oder Rentnern würden damit steigen. „Dabei ist es unser Ziel, die Verfahrensdauer zu verkürzen“, meinte die Juristin. „Aber die Entscheidungen sollen ja auch gründlich und richtig sein.“
Derzeit müssten Kläger im Durchschnitt 15 Monate warten, bis sie bei den Sozialgerichten in Berlin und Brandenburg ein Urteil erhielten. „Auch unser Problem mit den Altfällen wird dadurch nicht kleiner.“ Vorbeugen könnten die Gerichte aber kaum. „Das kommt über uns - vor allem auf die Richter in erster Instanz“, sagte Paulat. Das Personal werde nach besten Kräften versuchen, die Fälle zügig abzuarbeiten. „Wir werden die Entwicklung beobachten und je nach Bedarf auf die Justizverwaltung zugehen und Hilfe einfordern.“
Bereits in diesem Jahr seien die Sozialgericht wegen der vielen Klagen zu Hartz IV personell verstärkt worden. In diesem Jahr wird es keinen Hartz-IV-Kompromiss mehr geben. Die dazu eingesetzte Bund-Länder-Arbeitsgruppe kommt das nächste Mal erst wieder am 7. Januar zusammen. Damit gibt es zum 1. Januar kein neues Gesetz. Dies hatte das Bundesverfassungsgerichts aber gefordert, als es die bisherige Regelung für verfassungswidrig erklärt hatte. Hartz- IV-Empfänger könnten damit gegen die Bescheide der Behörden vorgehen.

description.hltext_display: Demi Lovato Vents Anger On Ashley Greene Through Hate E-mail
description.content: : All is definitely not well between the ex and the present girlfriend of Joe Jonas. According to reports in the media, Demi Lovato cannot get over her feelings for the singer and has thus made present girlfriend Ashley Greene the subject of her frustrationsRecent media reports suggest that Demi Lovato had sent a hate email to Ashley Greene while she was on tour with Joe Jonas. In fact it was the online exchanges between them that led to the breakdown of Demi Lovato after which she had to be sent to a rehabilitation center. The mails which have surfaced recently reveal Demi Lovatos hatred for Ashley Greene. She was the one to begin the fight accusing Ashley Greene of snatching away Joe Jonas from her and then forcing him to make the relationship public by parading with him on his concert tour. Well, the Twilight actress too was in no mood to play the subdued listener, replying with a picture of herself with Joe Jonas, the best way to shut Demi Lovato up. The heated exchanges continued for a while before the singer girlfriend of Joe Jonas found herself admitted in a clinic for treatment.Well, Ashley Greene and Joe Jonas have decided to move in together and it looks like the couple are quite serious about their relationship. The troublesome Demi Lovato too is presently out of their lives as she spends her days in rehab.

description.hltext_display: Ungersk mediekontroll fördöms
description.content: Sedan det ungerska parlamentet natten till tisdagen ändrade författningen och införde en lag om statlig kontroll av press, radio, tv och internet möter den ungerska regeringen, som nästa vecka övertar EU-ordförandeskapet, mycket hård kritik från utlandet. Luxemburgs utrikesminister kräver att EU-kommissionen omedelbart agerar mot planerna och han ifrågasätter om Ungern är värdigt att leda EU.

description.hltext_display: EMS: Friday's bus crash could have been worse
description.content:
A passenger bus carrying 48 people skidded off icy U.S. Highway 54 Friday, injuring 21. It could have been much worse.
"They had an angel riding with them," said Lincoln County EMS Director Jim Stover of the 48 passengers. "There was a cattle truck going north and he saw the bus skidding on the ice and put his truck into the ditch to keep from hitting them. He saved a lot of lives."
"I met a southbound tour bus coming around a little curve with a slight knoll," truck driver James Marx said. "Its wheels were over the center of the road."
Marx said the bus, a Los Paisanos Tour bus going from Denver to El Paso, went back into the southbound lane, but went too far and dropped off the side of the road. Marx said the bus driver overcorrected and went into the northbound lane again.
"I was slowing down and traveling about 45 mph," Marx said. "The driver of the bus tried to get back into his lane. He overcompensated, causing him to slide sideways then flip over onto the driver's side."
Marx said the nose of the sliding bus struck a bank on the northbound side of the road, causing the rear of the bus to slide around into the southbound lane.
"I always wondered what I would do in a situation like this," the 49-year-old truck driver said. "Now I know. I put the truck in the ditch to keep from hitting the bus head-on, possibly cutting it in half."
Marx took his Peterbilt semi tractor and trailer load of calves off the southbound side of the road, over a five-
to six-foot bank.
"As I was exiting, I hit the rear tires of the bus, causing it to go into the northbound lane," Marx said.
He brought his truck to a stop along the fence in the ditch and went to the bus to help people trying to climb out the windows.
"The people coming out did not seem to be badly hurt," Marx said. "I went to the front of the bus and saw the windshield was completely gone from the impact of hitting the embankment on the northbound side of the road."
Marx said he saw a man with a broken arm and badly injured sitting inside the bus and others climbing over luggage and personal belongings to get out of the front of the overturned bus.
Two of the injured, including the man identified as the bus driver, Jose Medina, 71, of El Paso, Texas, were listed in critical condition at Gerald Champion Regional Medical Center in Alamogordo before they were transported to University Medical Center in El Paso. Medina was reported to have a broken arm and possible broken legs.
Marx said there was another man, uninjured in the accident, that he thought was the bus driver because he was the only English speaker and was dressed better than the passengers.
Lily Lewis, spokesperson for Gerald Champion, said the facility received 12 patients from the accident at 10 a.m. The remaining 10 were to be discharged Friday, with possibly a "couple" being admitted to the hospital overnight.
Lincoln County Medical Center in Ruidoso received nine of the injured. Eight were treated and released, according to hospital spokesperson Brad Treptow. The other patient was transferred to Gerald Champion at about 2:30 p.m.
Stover said Carrizozo Schools sent a bus to the crash scene to transport the uninjured passengers to Corona, where the Corona School opened the gymnasium to provide temporary shelter. One of those transported to Corona was then taken to Lincoln County Medical Center by Vaughn EMS when the passenger complained of pain.
The accident took three hours to clear, and Highway 54 between Corona and Carrizozo was shut down for about two and a half hours.
Buses 'scary'
Marx said he has been driving a truck for 25 years. At this time of the year, for about three months, he hauls Mexican cattle from the border to feedlots in the Panhandle. He makes the Panhandle trip weekly on Highway 54.
"These buses scare me," he said. "And I am not the only one."
"They drive too fast, are all over the road and won't dim their headlights."
After the officer investigating the accident released Marx, a Carrizozo Auto Salvage wrecker pulled his tractor and trailer out of the ditch.
"I was very worried about my truck flipping over with my 119 calves inside, during the accident and also while being pulled out over that embankment," Marx said.
None of the calves were injured during either maneuver.
"I proceeded north on Highway 54 thinking about what had just happened, hoping I wouldn't meet another fast-moving tour bus," Marx said. "I will never forget what I witnessed that day. I will have nightmares for years after this.
"I would like to add that all the officers and medical personnel that were there did a fantastic job handling such a tragic accident," he said.
Not the first
This is the second serious accident involving Los Paisanos Tour Company in the same general vicinity in the past two years.
On Dec. 26, 2008, a packed bus headed from El Paso to Colorado rolled over and crashed north of Corona in Torrance County. Two passengers, both adults, were killed. A total of 46 were hurt.
That bus was traveling north, when the driver lost control in a construction zone, hit the median and flipped the bus.
According to a KRQE-TV report out of Albuquerque, deputies on the scene "said they have not seen a crash of this magnitude in a long time."
Stover said many responders to Friday's crash also responded to the crash of two years ago.
"That was in the middle of the night," he said. "Thankfully this was during the day."
Earlier this month, according to a story filed by Ramon Bracamontes of the El Paso Times, an El Paso jury ordered Los Paisanos to pay more than $132 million to the victims of a fatal crash on a snowy Colorado road in 2005.
The jury had found that the van carrying 11 passengers had bald tires and no safety belts.
Two people died, and several others were injured in that crash.
The judgment against Los Paisanos bus lines and its owner, Uriel Chavira, was reached after a four-day trial.
"Los Paisanos treated these poor people like cattle," Bracamontes quoted Craig M. Sico, a lawyer for the plaintiffs in that case. "The van, without seat belts, was driven over 188,000 miles in two years in the furtherance of an illegal interstate operation to move Mexican citizens across state lines."
According to the lawsuit, 33 people from El Paso and Juárez boarded a Los Paisanos bus in El Paso and headed for Denver. Once the bus reached Denver, 11 of the passengers, all from Juárez, were transferred to a 15-passenger van owned by Los Paisanos. They were headed to Nebraska.
According to testimony, the van was on a highway just outside Denver when the driver, Heriberto Flores-Garcia, began speeding and eating at the same time. He lost control of the van, which went over an embankment and rolled.

event_or_fact.property: And I am not the only one.

description.hltext_display: LG telefonuose skambės kompozitoriaus E.Morricone kūriniai (IT)
description.content:
Viena pirmaujančių pasaulio mobiliųjų komunikacijų gamintojų ir technologijų novatorių „LG Electronics“ (LG) pristato išskirtinę muzikos ir telefonų skambučių kolekciją, kurią sukūrė kompozitorius Ennio Morricone.
Išskirtinė muzikos kolekcija bus siūloma visuose naujuose LG išmaniuosiuose telefonuose.
REKLAMA
LG išmaniesiems telefonams skirtoje kolekcijoje pristatomos naujos melodijos ir legendiniuose kino filmuose „Cinema Paradiso“, „The Mission“, „Love Affair“ skambėję kūriniai.
„Ennio Morricone yra vienas geriausių visų laikų kompozitorių, jo kūriniai papuošė daug legendinių vesternų, melodramų, nuotykių filmų. Populiariausi kino filmų garso takeliai kartu su naujais kūriniais išplės telefonų melodijų pasirinkimą, o kokybišką skambesį atkuriantys LG išmanieji telefonai funkcijomis nenusileis muzikos grotuvams“, - sako Jong-seok Park, „LG Electronics Mobile Communications Company“ prezidentas ir vykdomasis direktorius.
Išskirtinė muzikos kolekcija bus siūloma visuose naujuose LG išmaniuosiuose telefonuose, pradedant kitą mėnesį Europos rinkoje pristatomu „LG Optimus 2X“. Išmaniųjų telefonų naudotojai galės rinktis iš 25 E. Morricone kūrinių – 15 specialiai LG telefonams sukurtų melodijų ir 10 garsiausių kino filmuose skambėjusių kompozitoriaus kūrinių.
LG taip pat išplės ir kitų su E. Morricone susijusių priedų – paveikslėlių, vaizdo įrašų – pasirinkimą. Juos LG telefonų naudotojai galės nemokamai parsisiųsti iš virtualios parduotuvės „LG Applications Store“.
Italijoje gimęs Ennio Morricone per savo karjerą sukūrė ir aranžavo muziką daugiau nei penkiems šimtams kino filmų ir televizijos programų.

description.hltext_display: US fishermen say new law ends Canadian advantage
description.author: Jay Lindsay
description.content:
Congress passed a law yesterday that fishermen say will bring fairness to fish-sharing negotiations with Canada and probably lead to a higher catch limit on a key New England species.
Every year, negotiators decide how much each nation can pull up in a rich section of the Georges Bank fishing grounds that includes both US and Canadian waters.
The new law allows the United States to deal with Canada without being held to the tight 10-year timeline to rebuild the fish stocks, which applies in all other American waters.
Without the pressure of that timeline, Canada can allow its fishermen to catch more of a given species in a given year. The change evens things out, lawmakers said.?For too long, our fishery managers have been placed at a competitive disadvantage in negotiating catch limits with their Canadian counterparts because of an erroneous interpretation of the law,?? said US Senator Olympia Snowe, a Maine Republican, who led the push for passage of the law with US Representative Barney Frank, a Massachusetts Democrat.
Fishermen are hoping the change will lead to a quick increase in what they say is an unnecessarily low catch limit for yellowtail flounder. That low limit threatens the entire industry, they say, because new rules shut down fishing on all species once the catch limit on even one species is reached.
The basic fix in the law means the United States now recognizes its agreement with Canada as an ?international agreement.?? The nation?s fishery law, the Magnuson-Stevens Act, allows such agreements to include stock rebuilding periods longer than the 10-year timeline.
Each year as part of the United States-Canada Transboundary Resource Sharing Understanding, the United States and Canada split up the cod, haddock, and flounder that swim in a 45,000-square-mile section of US-Canadian waters.
Without the change, American fishermen could get stuck watching Canadians catch the same fish they are forbidden from taking, because the Canadians were not subject to stricter American law, said Vito Giacalone of the Northeast Seafood Coalition, an industry group that pushed for the legislation.
Upon being signed by President Obama, the law will go into effect during the current fishing year, which runs until April.

description.hltext_display: Valladolid acoge desde hoy la VI muestra de arte Aspace con obras de 70 autores a beneficio de ...
description.content:
Valladolid acoge desde hoy y hasta el próximo día 5 de enero la VI muestra de arte Aspace, 'Art Aspace 2010', en la que se recogen obras de 70 fotógrafos y pintores realizadas a beneficio de esta asociación de afectados por parálisis cerebral.
Según informaron a Europa Press fuentes del colectivo esta muestra se desarrolla en la asociación desde 2005 y ha logrado convertirse ya en un "referente" que une "arte y discapacidad" y que se puede visitar en el Centro de Aspace en Valladolid ubicado en el Paseo Jardín Botánico.
De este modo, el centro de la Asociación de padres, tutores y personas con parálisis cerebral y afines se convierte por unos días en un lugar para la "contemplación y el disfrute visual".
Los 70 artistas participantes apoyan a través de sus creaciones de manera desinteresada este proyecto de "futuro" a través de su "amplia mirada plástica".
Los autores colaboradores Alberto Valverde Amor Calderón Ángel Acedo; Antonio Agüera Antonio Moreno; Belén González; Carlos Montenegro; Carlos Montes; Carmela Rodríguez; Carmen Bayón y Pedro Martín; Casilda García Archilla; Chema Herreros; Coca Garrido; Daniel Carrascal Platero; Daniel Villalobos; Darío Álvarez; Eduardo Alonso; Eduardo Fraile; Eva Gutiérrez; Feliciano Álvarez; Félix Rebollo; Fernando Díaz Pinés; Fernando Fuentes; Fernando Linares; Fructuoso Buendía; Gerardo Vacas; Gloria G. Pertejo; Hiroshi Ito Illo; Iván Rincón; Javier de Luna; José Antonio Muñoz Bernardo; José Carlos Sanz Belloso y José Emiliano Ibáñez.
Asimismo también participan José Luis Murcia; José Manuel Martínez; José María Arévalo; José María del Fraile Galán; José María Yagüe; José Noriega; Josefina González; Juan A. López Sastre; Juan Carlos Arnuncio; Juan Carlos Román; Juan Luis de las Rivas; Juan M. Báez; Luis Cruz Hernández; Luis José Cuadrado; M. García Manuel Prieto Manuel Sierra; Mariano Olcese; Marta González; Marta Úbeda; Mercedes Vecino; Miguel Ángel Aníbarro; Miguel Ángel de la Iglesia; Mónica Aguado; Nieves Fernández; Paloma Gil; Ramón R. Llera; Raúl Marrón; Rodrigo Almonacid; Rufa Fernández; Santiago Bellido; Segismundo Fernández y Toni Vila.

description.hltext_display: “阴谋论”之辩
Eindhoven Airport: recordaantal passagiers
description.content: EINDHOVEN - Eindhoven Airport heeft dit jaar de grens van twee miljoen passagiers doorbroken. Dit jaar vlogen 2,14 miljoen passagiers van en naar Eindhoven Airport. Dat is een kwart meer dan in 2009 (1.712.000). Dat liet de regionale luchthaven woensdag weten. Volgens de regionale luchthaven is een toename van het aantal nieuwe bestemmingen de belangrijkste oorzaak van de groei. Vanaf Eindhoven Airport kan worden gevlogen naar 32 lijndienstbestemmingen. Eind 2009 waren dat er nog 23.Voor volgend jaar verwacht Eindhoven Airport 15 procent meer passagiers te vervoeren. (ANP)

description.hltext_display: eBay推出本地购物工具GiftsNearby
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
腾讯科技讯（Kathy）北京时间12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，eBay以7500万美元收购本地产品库存和购物网站Milo.com后，立刻着手将该网站的技术与自己的产品进行整合。随着圣诞购物季的全面展开，eBay已将Milo的本地内容添加到了自己的条码扫描应用程序Redlaser（iPhone和Android的比较购物工具）中。今天，eBay又推出了迄今为止其最重要的Milo整合产品，本地购物工具GiftsNearby（giftsnearby.ebay.com）。
使用GiftsNearby，消费者们可以了解附近的本地零售商出售哪些礼物，比如电子产品、家用电器和玩具等。 GiftsNearby还会显示每种产品的本地零售价，以及去距离最近的、尚有该种产品库存的商店的路线，消费者也可以选择浏览eBay来寻找礼物。eBay不仅确保GiftsNearby只显示真正有库存的商店，而且还利用Milo现有的伙伴关系网，在GiftsNearby中显示25个全国性连锁零售商中的产品，这些零售商包括Target、RadioShack、Toys R Us和Sears。
在线研究、离线购买
百思买（Best Buy）也是这些零售商中的一家，而且它已经与eBay进行了更深入的整合。用户可以在线预定和购买百思买的礼物，然后就在本地商店里取货，避免了排长队等候。而且采用这种购买方式的用户还可以获得eBay的奖励积分。
对于eBay来说，Milo是它进入本地购物市场的一条渠道。据市场顾问公司Forrester估计，“在线研究、离线购买”式购物的市场规模已达9170亿美元，到2013年将增至1.3万亿美元，占零售总额的近50％。eBay的首席技术官马克房ǜ袼?Mark Carges)最近曾表示，eBay终于决定将Milo整合到其搜索结果中，因此，如果你在eBay上搜索一个苹果iPad，你将会看到提供该产品的在线销售商以及在你家附近的、有库存的本地零售商。
eBay VS. 谷歌
搜索巨头谷歌也看到了这个市场的潜力，并且也在将本地产品信息纳入到它的搜索服务中。今年早些时候，谷歌推出了移动搜索产品Blue Dot。像Milo一样，Blue Dot也能让搜索用户看到附近的商店里是否有某个产品的库存。几周前，谷歌推出了购物搜索（Product Search）的新版本，添加了70个流行零售品牌的更多库存清单，其中很多品牌也给Milo提供库存清单。
业界人士认为，相对于对谷歌来说，eBay的一个优势在于它享有“网上购物好去处”的声誉。谷歌虽然一直在努力改善其购物体验，它却不是一个电子商务平台。显然，eBay正在努力扩大在本地商户中的影响，它购买和整合Milo的快速高效值得赞扬。

description.hltext_display: Суд Дубая смягчил наказание осужденным за убийство Ямадаева
description.content:
Апелляционный суд Дубая заменил пожизненное заключение участникам дела об убийстве командира чеченского батальона "Восток" Сулима на 27 месяцев лишения свободы, сообщает корреспондент РИА "Новости" из зала суда.
Покушение на Сулима Ямадаева было совершено в Объединенных Арабских Эмиратах в конце марта 2009 года. В апреле 2010 года дубайский суд приговорил иранца Махди Лорния и бывшего конюха Кадырова гражданина Таджикистана Максуджона Исматова к пожизненному лишению свободы.
Приговор был смягчен после того, как брат Сулима Ямадаева Иса помирился с Рамзаном Кадыровым, которого он раньше обвинял в убийстве своего родственника. Иса Ямадаев направил в апелляционный суд Дубая письмо с отказом от претензий к убийцам.

description.hltext_display: 保障房１０年 成都构建城乡居民“幸福村”（上）
Kamionstop lesz karácsonykor
description.content:
Korlátozzák a nehéz tehergépjárművek forgalmát a karácsony és szilveszter környéki munkaszüneti napokon és hétvégéken - közölte a Nemzeti Fejlesztési Minisztérium szerdán az MTI-vel.
Export-import forgalmat bonyolít, és EU-n kívüli partnere van?
Ha kérdése van vámügyintézés kapcsán, vagy ajánlatot kíván kérni: www.kkvszallitas.hu
A közlemény szerint a jogszabály hatálya alá tartozó járművek Magyarország közútjain december 24-én, pénteken 22 órától 24 óráig, december 25-én, szombaton 8 órától, december 26-án, vasárnap 22 óráig, illetve 2011. január 1-én, szombaton 8 órától, január 2-án, vasárnap 22 óráig nem közlekedhetnek.
A kormány novemberben döntött a kamionstop előírásainak módosításáról, a felmentési szabályok pontosításáról. A korlátozás alól felmentést kapnak a gyógyászati célú gázok szállítását végző, valamint a közüzemi és közérdekű beruházásokhoz használt tehergépkocsik.
A közlemény szerint az éves felmentés - kérelem esetén - a következő év január 31-ig tartó hatállyal is kiadható. A kérelmet nemcsak a jármű üzemben tartója, hanem a megrendelő is előterjesztheti. A változások 2011. január elsején lépnek hatályba.

description.hltext_display: Torstai vilkkain liikenteessä
description.content:
Joulun menoliikenne on Keski-Suomessa vilkkainta huomenna torstaina iltapäivän ja illan aikana, arvioi Liikkuva poliisi. Vilkkaimmat tiet ovat valtatiet 4 ja 9. Jyväskylään Kanavuoren ja Vaajakosken seuduille on odotettavissa ruuhkaa ja jonoja. Mahdollisesti muuttuva sää tuo haastavat ajo-olosuhteet. Pakkanen voi olla kova, mutta myös lauhtuvaa on luvattu. Lauhtuminen tekee tiet liukkaammiksi, ja lumisade saattaa tuoda pöllyävää lunta.
- Toivoisin, että matkalle lähtijät ottaisivat matkan yhdeksi jouluun kuuluvaksi luonnolliseksi osaksi. Että ei kiirehdittäisi matkalla hakemaan joulurauhaa määränpäästä, vaan otettaisiin löysin rantein ajan kanssa, ja huomioitaisiin muut kulkijat, sanoo ylikomisario Veikko Stolt Keski-Suomen liikkuvasta poliisista.
Poliisi valvoo joululiikenteessä ajotapoja, ajonopeuksia ja kuljettajien kuntoa.

description.hltext_display: US pushed for reopening Phulbari coalmine:WikiLeaks
description.content:
US diplomats put pressure on Bangladesh government to reinstate Phulbari coalmine, which was closed following violent protests, a leaked diplomatic cable shows.
James F Moriarty, US ambassador to Dhaka, held talks with the country's chief energy adviser last year, urging him to approve plans by the British company Global Coal Management (GCM) to begin open-cast coal mining in Phulbari area, The Guardian reported quoting documents released by WikiLeaks.
The GCM were forced to shut down operations in the country in 2006 after a grassroots demonstration turned violent. Three people were killed as soldiers fired at protesters, and several hundred were injured.
But the company has continued to maintain a strong presence in the country and has continued to lobby for rights to operate the coal mine ever since, The Guardian reported.
In a cable posted by WikiLeaks which was sent in July last year, Moriarty says he had urged Tawfiq Elahi Chowdhury, the prime minister's energy adviser, to authorise coal mining, saying that "open-pit mining seemed the best way forward".
The Guardian report reads: "Later on in the cable, Moriarty privately noted: "Asia Energy, the company behind the Phulbari project, has sixty percent US investment. Asia Energy officials told the Ambassador they were cautiously optimistic that the project would win government approval in the coming months.""
However, in the cable Moriarty also notes that Chowdhury admitted the coal mine was "politically sensitive in the light of the impoverished, historically oppressed tribal community residing on the land".
Chowdhury, according to the cable, then agrees to build support for the project through the parliamentary process.
GCM declined to comment, The Guardian report added.
Earlier this month, Steve Bywater, GCM's chairman, said that a Bangladeshi parliamentary standing committee had recommended that the country moves towards extracting coal reserves using open-cut mining methods, the report added.
The government of Bangladesh has not yet given any firm assurances over whether they will give the coalmine project the go-ahead. It remains a deeply contentious issue, with activists fearing the country's natural resources are due to be sold off to a string of foreign investors.
The British newspaper also reported the revelations that the US government continued to push for the Bangladeshi energy adviser to reinstate the plans are likely to cause greater anger among activists, who recently staged a 'long march' to demand Asia Energy leaves the country.

description.hltext_display: H.Clinton labiausiai nusipelniusios įmonės apdovanojimą įteikė bendrovei „Mars, Incorporated“ (Verslas)
description.content:
JAV valstybės departamento organizuotuose labiausiai nusipelniusios 2010 metų įmonės rinkimuose apdovanojimas atiteko „Mars, Incorporated“, aplenkusiai 78 kandidatus iš viso pasaulio. Jis bendrovei atiteko už darbą kakavos srityje, išlaikant ekologinę pusiausvyrą, ir pastangas gerinant ekonominį vystimąsi Afrikos kakavos augintojų rajonuose, Ganoje.
H.Clinton gyrė bendrovę „Mars, Incorporated“. "Reuters"
REKLAMA
Labiausiai nusipelniusios įmonės rinkimai JAV pradėti rengti nuo 1999 metų. Šie apdovanojimai skirti pagerbti šalies verslo įmones už rodomą pilietiškumą užsienio šalyse ir teigiamą įtaką Amerikos santykiams su užsienio valstybėmis. Tai pirmas kartas, kai Ganos nominuota įmonė gauna šį apdovanojimą.
Pagal iMPACT partnerystės programą, skirtą Afrikos kakavmedžius auginančios bendruomenės aplinkosauginėms, ekonominėms ir socialinėms problemoms spręsti, Ganoje „Mars, Incorporated“ padėjo įkurti daugiau kaip 800 tūkst. darbo vietų.
Bendrovė nuosekliai vykdo įsipareigojimus dėl sertifikuotos ir tvariame ūkyje išaugintos kakavos įsigijimo. „Mars, Incorporated“ glaudžiai bendradarbiauja su vietos bendruomenėmis Ganoje ir Dramblio Kaulo respublikoje, kur užauginama 60% visų pasaulio kakavos pupelių.
Šiais metais „Mars“, IBM ir JAV žemės ūkio departamentas atskleidė viešam naudojimui kakavos pupelių genomo seką, kuri pagelbės veisiant ir auginant atsparesnius išoriniam poveikiui kakavmedžius. Kakava patenka tarp dešimties svarbiausių pasaulio žemės ūkio produktų. Ji ypatingai svarbi daugelyje besivystančių šalių, kur kakavos pramonė sudaro didžiąją dalį šalies vidaus produkto. Pasauliniu mastu yra apie 6,5 mln. Kakavos augintojų, daugiausiai tai maži, šeimų valdomi ūkiai.

description.hltext_display: 올해 주식배당 노린다면 비상교육·에이블씨엔씨…
description.content: 올해 � 가증권시장에서 주식배당을 가장 많이 � 기업은 비상교육으로 나타났다. 코스닥시장에서는 에이블씨엔씨, JCE가 주식배당 예� 기업 1위로 파악됐다. 한국거래소는 이런 내용의 올해 12월 결산법인 주식배당 예� 현황 집계 결과를 22일 발표했다.이에 따르면 올해 주식배당을 공시한 법인은 총 37개사로 파악됐다. � 가시장에서 15개사, 코스닥에서 22개사가 주식배당을 한다� 밝혔다. 지난해 주식배당 예� 기업이 46개사였던 것을 감안하면 소폭 감소한 셈이다. 1주당 평� 배당 주식 수도 지난해 대비 0.016주 감소한 0.004주로 나타났다.비상교육의 올해 주식배당은 1주당 0.213주다. 황금에스티(0.083주)와 TCC동양(0.076주)이 그 뒤를 이었다. 이 중 TCC동양은 2년 연속 주식배당 예� 기업으로 분류됐다. 에이블씨엔씨와 JCE는 주당 0.1주를 배당� 예� �이다.이와 함께 12월 결산일을 기준으로 무상증자를 결� �한 기업은 14개사로 나타났다. 올해 1주당 평� 무상배� � 주식 수는 0.1555주로 지난해 0.093주 대비 0.062주 증가했다.코스닥시장의 이너스텍이 일대일 무상증자를 실시하며 팬엔터테인먼트와 하이소닉은 1주당 0.4주와 0.3주의 무상증자를 � 예� �이다. 보� �� �약 � 한양행 한미홀딩스 한미약품 등도 무상증자를 실시하며 비율은 1주당 0.05주다.올해는 이달 28일까지 주식을 매수해야 배당 또는 무상증자를 받을 수 있다.[문수인 기자]▶ [화보] "굴욕부터 NG까지"…2010 � �드카펫에서 생긴 일▶ 코스피, 연중 최� 치 행진 후 `숨� 르기`▶ `주가의 역설` PER 높을때 사야 돈번다▶ 한국증시 과속스캔들?…시가총액 증가율 세계 1위▶ 이세은, 반라로 목욕� 촬영 `매끈한 뒤태에 男心흔들`▶ `승승장구` 박진영, 이혼 후 첫 심경� 백 "그 사람에 대한 예의…"[ⓒ 매일경� � & mk.co.kr, 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.author: Gene Curtis
description.content: 1938 Labor troubles flared into the open at west Tulsa's huge Mid-Continent Petroleum Corp. refinery as the Oil Workers International Union issued a strike order, threatened for weeks, followed a few hours later by a tear gas barrage from Tulsa police officers. The strike lasted 15 months, ending March 21, 1940. There were bombings of company facilities, fights among strikers and nonstrikers and a general polarization of Tulsans. 1944 Brig. Gen. Anthony C. McAuliffe replied "Nuts!" to a Nazi demand that the Americans surrender during the Battle of the Bulge at Bastogne, Belgium. McAuliffe was the acting commander of the 101st Airborne Division when the demand came from German Gen. Heinrich Freiherr von LÃ1/4ttwitz, who was commanding a much larger force. 1978 Police in Des Plaines, Ill., arrested John Wayne Gacy Jr. and began unearthing the remains of 33 men and boys whom Gacy was later convicted of murdering between 1972 and 1978. Gacy, 36, a convicted sex offender who liked to dress as a clown at children's parties, had buried many of his victims in the crawl space of his house. Gacy was executed by lethal injection May 10, 1994. 1990 Lech Walesa took the oath of office as Poland's first popularly elected president after a decade-long struggle by the Solidarity movement to drive communists from power. Walesa, 47, pledged to press Poland's economic reforms, promising to continue decentralization so that "as many decisions as possible are made at the grass roots." He left office in 1995. Gene Curtis, 581-8304 gene.curtis@tulsaworld.com To purchase "Only in Oklahoma," a book of collected columns by Gene Curtis, visit tulsaworld.com/OnlyinOklahoma

event_or_fact.property: to press Poland's economic reforms, promising to continue decentralization so that "as many decisions as possible are made at the grass roots.

description.hltext_display: ISID、クラウドサービス基盤「CLOUDiS/IaaS」の提供を開始
description.content: 電通国際情報サービス（ISID）は、クラウドソリューション「CLOUDiS（クラウディス）」のメニューを拡充し、独自のクラウドサービス基盤である「CLOUDiS/IaaS（クラウディス・イアース）」の提供を2011年2月から開始すると発表した。CLOUDiS/IaaSは、同社がこれまで手掛けてきた数多くの企業におけるシステム導入実績と、プライベート/パブリック/ハイブリッドなどさまざまなクラウド環境でのシステム構築ノウハウに基づいて独自に構築したもの。同社によると、確実な情報セキュリティー管理が求められる業務システムのクラウド化にも適している。

description.hltext_display: 'Tatjana moet kiezen: Liefde of tv-show'
description.content:
HILVERSUM - Tatjana Simic moet kiezen tussen een RTL 4-programma waarin zij op zoek gaat naar een potentiële partner, of de partner die zij volgens showpresentator Evert Santegoed al zou hebben.
Volgens geruchten is Tatjana meer dan goede vrienden met haar buurman Chris van Eeghen. Daarmee zou de zoektocht van de actrice in Wie kiest Tatjana? slechts schijn zijn. Volgens De Telegraaf denkt RTL er over om de show af te blazen. Tatjana ontkent de geruchten overigens.� Bronnen binnen de zender laten weten dat het tekenen van het contract al twee keer is uitgesteld. Ook was de op 28 januari gepland staande eerste aflevering tijdelijk geschrapt, maar inmiddels toch weer aangekondigd bij de adverteerders. (NOVUM/AHA)

description.hltext_display: ［尖閣ビデオ流出］海上保安庁長官会見（レスポンス）
description.content:
レスポンス12月22日(水)17時35分配信
撮影＝中島みなみ
海上保安庁の鈴木久泰長官は22日午後6時、中国漁船と海上保安庁巡視船衝突ビデオがインターネット上に流出した事件について会見を行う。
第五管区海上保安本部に所属する元保安官や職員を監督する関係者に対する処分が発表される見込み。関係者の中には鈴木長官自身も含まれる。
馬淵澄夫国交相は同日午前の海上保安庁業務視察を終えた会見で「いまだ捜査中で、処分については捜査の結果、責任が明らかになり次第、発表する。事実関係が明らかでない状況で、処分について明らかにする立場にない」と、語っていた。

description.hltext_display: Lenkijoje parduodama vis daugiau knygų (Verslas)
description.content:
“Gazeta Wyborcza” ir lrytas.lt
Lenkijoje auga knygų pardavimai. Šiais metais pasiektas visų laikų pardavimų rekordas. Lenkai pirko knygų už 2,94 mlrd. zlotų (2,52 mlrd. litų).
Kas antras apklaustas lenkas sakė, kad dovanų Kalėdoms pirks knygą. T.Bauras
REKLAMA
Tokiam rezultatui įtakos turėjo ir kai kurių mokyklinių vadovėlių keitimas. Tačiau lenkai aktyviai papildo savo išsilavinimą, perka visokius patarimų vadovus bei mokslinius leidinius. Jų pardavimai išaugo beveik 9 procentais.
Kas antras apklaustas lenkas sakė, kad dovanų Kalėdoms pirks knygą. Tačiau ekspertai pažymi, kad kiti metai nebus leidėjams lengvi nes įvedamas 5 proc. PVM mokestis knygoms.
Lietuvių leidėjams ši žinia sukels karčią šypseną – čia jau prieš dvejus konservatorių ir liberalų Vyriausybė yra įvedusi 9 proc. PVM knygoms ir 21 proc. spaudai.
Komentarai
Vardas
El. paštas
Komentaras (iki 3000 simbolių) Komentatoriaus atsakomybė

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer: Defizite bei der Bahn
description.content: Berlin – Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer (CSU) hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. „Wir haben mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrühren”, sagte der CSU- Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden. „Es macht sich jetzt bemerkbar, dass man geglaubt hat, man könne sich das eine oder andere an der Reserve sparen.” Diese baue man zurzeit in allen Bereichen der Bahn wieder auf. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. „Aber die Öffentlichkeit kann erwarten, dass die Politik zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht werden - und das tun wir.”

description.hltext_display: Italy consumer confidence rises in December
description.content: ROME, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Italian consumer confidence rose for the fourth month in a row in December, beating forecasts for a slight decline as judgments on the overall state of the economy improved, data on Wednesday showed. Research institute ISAE's main confidence index rose to 109.1 in December from 108.5 in November, beating forecasts for a reading of 108.00. It was the highest reading since Jan. 2010. "Forecasts for the overall development of the country and the labour market and assessments of the suitability of acquiring durable goods were particularly favourable, while opinions about the suitability and scope for saving were negative," ISAE said in a statement on Wednesday. The sub-index for assessments of the general economic situation rose to 82.2 from 80.7 and there were slight rises in the sub-indices for personal conditions (121.9 from 121.7), the current situation (116.3 from 115.8) and expectations for the future (98.2 from 98.1), ISAE said. (Reporting by James Mackenzie, Rome Newsroom + 39 06 8522 4351) COPYRIGHT Copyright Thomson Reuters 2010. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: Downs councilor repeats criticism of treatment plant billing
description.content:
Holman: Added customers a burden
The level of Ruidoso's contribution to the regional wastewater treatment plant has again raised the ire of a Ruidoso Downs City Councilor.
Dean Holman called it a "very troublesome" and "continuing" problem.
"I try not to say anything too often and I try to let several months go by. But when I see these monthly billings that we get, I can't help but go back to an ongoing problem. And I don't think that it needs to not be mentioned anymore because some people may not like to hear it."
Holman said he believes one of the reasons for the increased volume of liquid waste to the plant was Ruidoso adding some parts of Mescalero, such as the Inn of the Mountain Gods, as a village sewage customer.
"So therefore, when there was more volume added, that increased our expenses. Everything from what we see right here," Holman said as he pointed to the plant's October and November operating bills.
"Not only the operating but the total cost of the plant. I think the village has caused us some problems because had some of these things done. We have a wastewater treatment plant that equates to a Cadillac when we possibly could have gotten by with a Chevy."
Construction of a mandated new plant, at a cost of $36 million, is expected to be completed in the spring of 2011.
Holman said Ruidoso adding customers has impacted Ruidoso Downs on all fronts.
"Now we're paying part of the price, which is heavy for us. Fifteen percent
of more is more."
The plant, used by the two municipalities, has 85 percent of its expenses paid by Ruidoso and 15 percent by Ruidoso Downs. Arbitration years ago arrived at the split.
In October, Ruidoso's Capital Projects Director Randall Camp told village councilors that for 2009-2010 the Ruidoso Downs percentage of the flow was actually 18.8 percent.
He said the village was essentially picking up the 3.8 percent difference. Camp did note at the time that sewage flows from two Mescalero commercial enterprises and one reservation subdivision was approaching 10 percent of the total contribution to the treatment plant.
Holman said his statements were not made to "stir up problems and get things going."
But he pointed to October's connection of a Ruidoso residence to the Ruidoso Downs sewage collection system. The two municipal councils disagreed on the urgency of hooking up the home that had a failed septic system.
A court order and a last-minute resolution by the two mayors extended a sewer line from the city to the residence just over the boundary in Ruidoso.
"We kind of took some hits on that and I don't think it was all our fault," Holman said.

description.hltext_display: El consumo de electricidad en China se duplicará para 2020
description.content: El consumo de electricidad en China se duplicará en 2020 respecto al de 2010, predijo el Consejo de Electricidad de China (CEC) y se situará en los 8,2 billones de kilovatios/hora, informó hoy la agencia oficial Xinhua. En 2010, el consumo eléctrico alcanzará los 4,17 billones de kilovatios/hora, cifra que en 2015 llegará a 6,27 billones kilovatios/hora, según el informe sobre la industria eléctrica elaborado por el Consejo para el XII Plan Quinquenal (2011-2015). En 2020, la capacidad instalada de generación eléctrica en China aumentará de los 950 millones de kilovatios del 2010 a 1.885 millones, de los que el 36,3% tendrá origen en combustibles no fósiles, destacó el documento.

description.hltext_display: 维基解密网和Facebook 谁才是最大泄密者？
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
阿桑奇和扎克伯格谁更糟？
【TechWeb报道】12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，当你的隐私遭到攻击，你会关心吗？互联网原本被设想为一个巨大的知识库、或者一个全球性通讯工具，但是随着时光推移，互联网成了追踪用户每次鼠标点击以及浪费用户大量时间的帮凶。即使如此，人们仍为所谓的信息变革欢呼：瞧，我的Twitter账户有无数关注者；我的Facebook好友人数如此庞大。为什么我们感觉自己是走在数字道路上的羔羊，正走向屠宰场。
在最新的《时代》年度人物评选中，读者积极为维基解密网创始人阿桑奇投票，编辑最终选取了Facebook联合创始人扎克伯格。其实，这两位风头正劲的人物都对隐私保护造成了威胁。
从某种意义上来说，维基解密网要撕掉一切隐私的面纱，该网站鼓励接触到秘密信息的举报人去揭露虚伪、谎言。这是否是个好主意取决于你所处的立场。基于自己的定位，维基解密网做了两件事情：其一，诠释了网络究竟是要做什么，满足了信息和知识传播的原始幻想；其二是让虚伪者为自己的一切行为负责。它所作的一切都是通过网络。
越来越多的人花费大量时间在自己的社交网络张贴无聊的视频，这让我们将注意力再次转向全球最大社交网站Facebook。众所周知，Facebook首席执行官扎克伯格刚被《时代》杂志评选为年度人物，他创造了一种交换信息和改变人们生活方式的新系统，当然这种服务正在“试图私下隐私的面纱”。但扎克伯格说，这只是帮助人们“更好地连接和分享”。
实际上，该网站唯一的目的是收集成员的信息，然后通过这些数据赚钱。可以根据用户的兴趣投放广告，还可以向用户出售虚拟物品和礼物。Facebook收集了大量用户信息，该网站知道用户住在哪里，年纪多大，访问过哪些网站，在哪里工作，去哪里度假，有哪些朋友以及喜欢吃什么。用Facebook的说法，这是用户的“社交图谱”。
所有这些对营销者来说都是非常有价值的信息，因为他们希望最深入地了解客户，并成功卖出自己的产品。
阿桑奇和扎克伯格，谁对隐私威胁更大？
维基解密网的大部分文件很重要，但却不是惊天动地的，我们真的在乎那些大事件吗？只不过提醒我们不要看表面。另一方面，Facebook是那样的有趣，但也有黑暗的一面-用户正成为广告商的金矿。其实最重要的是和隐私捆绑在一起的安全问题。
维基解密网迄今为止提出的一个潜在问题，也是唯一的潜在问题，即披露的文件可能影响国家安全工作以及军事行动，但在线追踪用户却能威胁到用户个人安全。最典型的例子是用户在Facebook发布的状态信息导致自己被抢劫。现在，Facebook已经能做到让每个人都知道你在哪里，而且是按分钟计算的。
同时，没有网站是不受黑客和网络犯罪分子攻击的，比如最近有人在八卦网站披露了超过100万用户的密码。用户的电子邮件姓名、电话号码、地址以及生日信息等都能帮助犯罪分子攻入用户的银行账户或进行信用卡欺诈行为。
是不是人人都对隐私泄露表示担忧？
家长很明显是最有担忧情绪的人群。Common Sense Media发布的最新调查显示，相比5年前，85%家长更担心在线隐私问题。此外，91%的家长认为谷歌等搜索引擎以及Facebook等社交网络不应该分享孩子的地理位置。另外，由Gallup发起的投票显示，三分之二的互联网用户认为广告商不应该被允许追踪自己的信息，并基于自己访问过的网站发布目标广告。
科技公司及广告商则认为这种追踪是无害的，停止后会束缚在线商务的发展，而这可是笔大买卖。今年上半年，网络广告营收达到了121亿美元。与此同时，网络隐私问题已经引起了监管部门的注意。
那么，维基解密网和

description.hltext_display: Viele niedersächsische Museen verzeichnen Besucherrückgang
description.content:
Die niedersächsischen Museen blicken auf ein durchschnittliches Jahr zurück. In den meisten Ausstellungshäusern gingen die Besucherzahlen im Vergleich zu 2009 zurück.
Text kleiner größer
Lesezeichen setzen:
Ins Sprengel Museum kamen 2009 rund 138.000 Besucher.
© dpa
Das Sprengel Museum Hannover zählte 138 000 Besucher - weniger als halb so viele wie im Rekordjahr 2009. Das Roemer- und Pelizaeus-Museum Hildesheim rechnet bis Ende des Jahres mit 55 000 bis 58 000 Gästen. Ins Braunschweigische Landesmuseum kamen nach 54 000 im Vorjahr nur 20 000 Besucher. Allerdings hatte das Haus das ganze Jahr über keine Leitung und keine Sonderausstellung. Viele Ausstellungsmacher machen den harten Winter mitverantwortlich für den Besucherrückgang.
Dagegen blickt das Kunstmuseum Wolfsburg mit 93 000 Gästen auf das erfolgreichste Jahr in der 16-jährigen Geschichte des Hauses zurück. „Die Ausstellungen zu James Turrell, Rudolf Steiner und Alberto Giacometti waren und sind der Mittelpunkt des Besucherinteresses“, teilte das Wolfsburger Museum mit. Trotz Interims-Lösung haben 38 500 Menschen dem Herzog Anton Ulrich-Museum in Braunschweig 2010 die Treue gehalten. Da das Haupthaus bis 2013 für mehr als 25 Millionen Euro saniert wird, ist das Museum in die Burg Dankwarderode gezogen.
Das Höhlen-Erlebnis-Zentrum Bad Grund im Kreis Osterode, das unter anderem einen Harzer Familienclan aus der Bronzezeit vorstellt, verzeichnete einen leichten Besucher-Rückgang auf rund 68 000. Grund sei der lange Winter, in dem weniger Gäste den Weg zur Iberger Tropfsteinhöhle gefunden haben, sagte eine Sprecherin. Konstante Besichtigungszahlen um die 30 000 verzeichnet dagegen das Zisterzienserkloster Walkenried im Südharz. Das Mönchehausmuseum für moderne Kunst in Goslar sei mit 15 000 Besuchern „ganz zufrieden“, sagte Leiterin Bettina Ruhrberg.
„Durch den langen Winter sind alle Häuser auf der Strecke geblieben“, sagte der Direktor der Kestnergesellschaft Hannover, Veit Görner. In sein Haus kamen 19 500 Gäste, ein Drittel weniger als 2009, das durch die äußerst erfolgreiche „Bookmarks“-Schau herausstach. Görner erhofft sich von einer Nicht-Besucher-Befragung Anregungen, was verbessert werden muss. „Kulturroutinen haben sich verändert“, sagte der Chef der Kestnergesellschaft. „Die Menschen haben die Wahl zwischen immer mehr Angeboten und entscheiden sich immer kurzfristiger.“
Der Direktor des Sprengel Museums, Ulrich Krempel, berichtete: „Im Moment haben wir viele wetterbedingt abgesagte Termine von auswärtigen Gruppen.“ Er sei aber mit der Besucherzahl „ganz zufrieden“. 2009 hatte das Museum insgesamt 341 000 Gäste - dank der großen „Marc, Macke, Delaunay“-Schau. Einige Museen, unter anderem in Osnabrück und Oldenburg, wollen ihre Jahresbilanz erst im Januar 2011 veröffentlichen.

description.hltext_display: 매경 베스트 클릭 (12월 22일)
